T02D1851-2:29a-7: ba ni bgegs rnams choms shig choms shig / ltung
T02D1851-2:29a-8: bar gyis shig / ltung bar gyis shig ces bya
T02D1851-2:29a-9: pa'o // pa'o // ba'i don to // sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D1851-2:29a-10: sngags kyi yi ge ni yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:29a-11: tsher ma'i me la zhes bya ba ni po son cha dang /
T02D1851-2:29a-12: tsher ma can la sogs pa'i shing las spar ba'i me la'o //
T02D1851-2:29a-13: bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcad par aom: hr'i:
T02D1851-2:29a-14: shtri: bi kri t'a na na k+n+ya che ge mo
T02D1851-2:29a-15: stam bha ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes
T02D1851-2:29a-16: bzla'o // gru gsum zhes bya ba ni me thab grub gsum du'o //
T02D1851-2:29a-17: stong rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ni sreg blugs stong las brgyad lhag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:29a-18: tshul bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gshin rje mthar
T02D1851-2:29a-19: byed ser po'i sbyor bas me thab kyi me la
T02D1851-2:29a-21: de'i zhal gdangs shing ljags h'um dang ldan pa la sbyin sreg bya zhing bu mo de dang /
T02D1851-2:29a-22: sbyin pa po'i spyi bor gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D1851-2:29a-23: rje la ri rab dang mnyam pa'i gshin rje mthar
T02D1851-2:29a-24: byed ser po g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan par
T02D1851-2:29a-25: bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:29a-26: don gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i don du'o //
T02D1851-2:29a-27: gnon par gyur zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang bu mo gzhan la mi sbyin par ro //
T02D1851-2:29a-28: bskal ba grangs med gsum du yang //
T02D1851-2:29a-29: zhes bya ba ni gal te dus de srid kyi
T02D1851-2:29a-30: bar du bu mo de nyid du 'gyur zhing 'tsho
T02D1851-2:29a-32: gal te 'di sangs rgyas la sogs pa yang yin
T02D1851-2:29a-33: par 'gyur zhing gal te de yang 'das na ni
T02D1851-2:29a-34: ste // de gzhan la byin nam len par byed na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:29a-35: 'dir man ngag las sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya ste /
T02D1851-2:29a-36: dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag dang ske
T02D1851-2:29a-37: tshe dang lan tshvas me'i me'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus
T02D1851-2:29a-38: su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang de'i lte bar
T02D1851-2:29a-39: sngags dang spel ba'i bu mo'i ming bris pa /
T02D1851-2:29a-40: dug dang grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
T02D1851-2:29a-42: ske tshe dang lan tshva las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1851-2:29a-43: gyi snying gar bcug nas bkug cing thod pa kha
T02D1851-2:29a-44: sbyor gyi nang du bcu ste /
T02D1851-2:29a-45: bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags pa brjod la //
T02D1851-2:29a-46: nyi ma gsum gyi bar du khros pas tsher ma'i
T02D1851-2:29a-47: me la bsros na de ltar rengs par 'gyur ro
T02D1851-2:29b-0: // tshig 'phrog pa la sogs @29b pa la ni
T02D1851-2:29b-1: che ge mo'i ba tsam ga ma na ma ga
T02D1851-2:29b-2: ma nam ba stam bha ya zhes bya ba'i bskul
T02D1851-2:29b-3: ba'i tshig gi khyad par gyis 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:29b-4: de la sbyor ba ni dur khrod kyi ras la
T02D1851-2:29b-5: ba bla dang rdo rgyus dang srin lag gi khrag
T02D1851-2:29b-6: gis sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbang gi dkyil
T02D1851-2:29b-7: 'khor dang de la sngags dang spel ba'i bsgrub par
T02D1851-2:29b-8: bya ba'i ming bris pa chu'i ngogs gnyis kyi sa
T02D1851-2:29b-9: las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi kha la sogs par
T02D1851-2:29b-10: bcug ste / bkug cing kham phor kha sbyar la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:29b-11: bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
T02D1851-2:29b-12: zhes bya ba la mar ngo'i zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1851-2:29b-13: dur khrod ces bya ba ni mi shi ba bsregs ma thag pa'i gnas las so //
T02D1851-2:29b-14: blangs nas zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor bas blangs nas so //
T02D1851-2:29b-15: sngags btab na zhes bya ba ni de'i sbyor ba
T02D1851-2:29b-16: nyid kyis hr'i: shtri: zhes bya ba'i sngags stong rtsa
T02D1851-2:29b-17: brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas na'o //
T02D1851-2:29b-18: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed
T02D1851-2:29b-19: kyi sbyor ba nyid kyis gnas la sol ba de
T02D1851-2:29b-20: dang / aom hr'i: shtri: bi kri t'a na na
T02D1851-2:29b-21: che ge mo ya kash+ya che ge mo ka nam
T02D1851-2:29b-22: da d'a tu h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1851-2:29b-23: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang spel zhing bskul ba'i tshig
T02D1851-2:29b-24: dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang yin
T02D1851-2:29b-26: ster bar 'gyur te de nyid ster bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:29b-27: gzhung la la las ni 'dul byed 'gyur zhes 'byung ste /
T02D1851-2:29b-28: der ni de nyid kyi bu mo la gags [*'gags?]
T02D1851-2:29b-29: byed pa de'i bu mo ster ba'i phyir 'dul bar
T02D1851-2:29b-30: byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:29b-31: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni nges par ro //
T02D1851-2:29b-32: zhar la sbyor ba gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir sngags
T02D1851-2:29b-33: shes pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1851-2:29b-34: te / gang yang rung ba'i dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1851-2:29b-35: de bzhin du mngon par bsngags pa'i so la ba
T02D1851-2:29b-36: de nyid kyis byas nas ni bkug la'o //
T02D1851-2:29b-37: bsam gtan dag gis zhes bya ba la /
T02D1851-2:29b-38: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed nyid dang /

T02D1851-2:30a-8: ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba lag tu bsams la de

T02D1851-2:30a-12: rdo rgyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sogs
T02D1851-2:30a-13: pa'i sgras ni btsag gam ba bla dag gis so

T02D1851-2:30a-21: // yang na'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa'i sangs rgyas la blta bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:30a-22: snad 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:30a-23: gal te bsnun par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:30a-24: la dor ba gsungs pa 'di ni sbyor ba la bstod pa'i don to //
T02D1851-2:30a-25: char ches pa'am dkyil 'khor bri ba ni char gcad pa'i phyir /
T02D1851-2:30a-26: las kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:30a-27: la don ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ser ba'i
T02D1851-2:30a-28: sbyor ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa
T02D1851-2:30a-29: dang / grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa'i steng
T02D1851-2:30a-30: gi bar snang la yi ge ha las byung ba'i
T02D1851-2:30a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje ser po 'bar ba mngon par
T02D1851-2:30a-32: 'dod pa'i phyogs khebs par gnas pa de'i dbus su
T02D1851-2:30a-33: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po rtse mo
T02D1851-2:30a-34: gyen du bltas pa bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar
T02D1851-2:30a-36: de'i lte bar de nyid kyi sbyor bad 'dug la
T02D1851-2:30a-37: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i rdo
T02D1851-2:30a-38: rje phra mo lta bu'i 'od zer ser po'i tshogs
T02D1851-2:30a-39: kyis nam mkha'i ngos khebs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:30a-40: de lta bus ni mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas las
T02D1851-2:30a-41: phyi rol nyid du char 'bab kyi nang du ni
T02D1851-2:30a-42: ma yin no // 'di tsam thams cad kyis kyang sngags pa'i mthu bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:30a-43: gang gi tshe thams cad du char gcod par 'dod
T02D1851-2:30a-44: pa de'i tshe nam mkha'i gtos khyab pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1851-2:30a-46: rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i rang gi rdo rje
T02D1851-2:30a-47: 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams spros pas klu
T02D1851-2:30b-0: thams cad @30b yongs su bskams par bsam par bya'o
T02D1851-2:30b-1: // yang na rdo rgyus la sogs pas dur khrod
T02D1851-2:30b-2: kyi ras kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad
T02D1851-2:30b-3: po rang gi sa bon dang de'i lte bar phat
T02D1851-2:30b-4: dang spel ba'i chu lha bris nas bkug ste /
T02D1851-2:30b-5: ras gnyis pa la sna tshogs rdo rje ser po
T02D1851-2:30b-6: 'bar ba'i lte bar khro bo'i rdo rje 'greng ba
T02D1851-2:30b-7: h'um gis mtshan pa bris la /
T02D1851-2:30b-8: de'i steng du khas phub ste kha sbyar byas la
T02D1851-2:30b-9: rdo leb kyis mnan te bzhag na char gcod par
T02D1851-2:30b-10: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
T02D1851-2:30b-11: dkyil 'khor dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1851-2:30b-12: rlung la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang char
T02D1851-2:30b-13: dang ser ba dang thog 'bab pa dang sa g-yo
T02D1851-2:30b-15: mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su //
T02D1851-2:30b-16: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag
T02D1851-2:30b-17: rgya chen po rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba 'jig
T02D1851-2:30b-18: pa'i dus ltar snang ba ri rab kyi tshad tsam
T02D1851-2:30b-19: khro bo'i lta bas bgegs kyi gnas rtogs par byed
T02D1851-2:30b-20: pa can brtan por byas nas zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1851-2:30b-21: to // gdug pa'i dgra ni bgegs mthar byed do//
T02D1851-2:30b-22: de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yi ge phat de de brjod par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:30b-23: brjod pa'i rjes thogs nyid la 'byin pa'i rlung spros
T02D1851-2:30b-24: pa las khro bo'i rigs kyis bgegs rnams bzlog par
T02D1851-2:30b-25: bsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:30b-26: rlung la sogs pa sprul par gyur pa 'gag par 'gyur te rnam par dengs par 'gyur ro ;
T02D1851-2:30b-27: /'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sprul pa rnams so //
T02D1851-2:30b-28: mngon spyod kyang sngags 'di nyid kyis bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:30b-29: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1851-2:30b-30: sngags de nyid ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:30b-31: sngags kyi gsang ba ni gsang sngags so //
T02D1851-2:30b-32: de rnams kyi snying po ni gces pa'o ;
T02D1851-2:30b-33: / de de ltar na bu mo rnyed pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:30b-34: zhar las byung ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad
T02D1851-2:30b-35: nas nge byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /
T02D1851-2:30b-36: bu mo rnyed pa dang lhan cig zla ba drug
T02D1851-2:30b-37: gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad nas sngar
T02D1851-2:30b-38: bsnyen pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dag gis khyad
T02D1851-2:30b-39: par thob pa can gyis le'u'i rtsom par gsungs pa'i
T02D1851-2:30b-40: cho gas bu mo de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:30b-41: cho ga de nyid kha bskang ba'i phyir ye shes
T02D1851-2:30b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la ye
T02D1851-2:30b-43: shes sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1851-2:30b-44: de'i sbyor ba ni der lhag par mos pa'o //
T02D1851-2:30b-45: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan la'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-0: @31a * // gzugs ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-1: ji ltar zhe na ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba
T02D1851-2:31a-2: yis te bskyed par bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1851-2:31a-3: ye shes sems dpa'i rigs lngas bskor ba'i rigs kyi
T02D1851-2:31a-4: bdag po mdun gyi nam mkha' la lta'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-5: de'i rab sbyor ni de nyid dbus kyi gdan la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-6: sngags zhes pa ni rigs dang rigs kyi bdag po'i rig pa yongs su shes pas so //
T02D1851-2:31a-7: gnas bzhi ru zhes bya ba ni de'i logs kyi ba dan re re la'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-8: bud med ces bya ba ni rang rang gi rigs
T02D1851-2:31a-9: kyi sngags kyi mchog bsdus pa las byung ba'i rig
T02D1851-2:31a-10: pa'i rgyal mo'o ; / de la rigs gnyis bsdus pa las byung ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-12: de rgyas pa ni rang gi rdo rje bcug pas kha phye ba byas nas so //
T02D1851-2:31a-13: sngags 'di zhes bya ba ni dam pa dang po'i snying po gnyis pa'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-14: de nyid gsungs pa h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-16: 'od zer lnga ni rab tu 'bar ba ste /
T02D1851-2:31a-17: sangs rgyas lnga'i rnam pa'i 'od zer can te /
T02D1851-2:31a-18: sangs rgyas lnga'i rnam par 'od 'phro bas 'od zer
T02D1851-2:31a-19: lnga po de dag zhugs pas ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D1851-2:31a-20: bzhin gyis khyad par du 'phags par snang bas na
T02D1851-2:31a-21: rab po // yang zhu bar gyur pas na 'bar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-22: rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom ;
T02D1851-2:31a-23: / zhes pa ni rdo rje can ni rang gi rdo rje'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-24: de'i sbyor ba ni zhu ba'i ye shes de nyid kyis de'i nang du dgang zhing ldan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-25: dbab ces bya ba ni zhu ba'i ye shes de nyid dgod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:31a-26: rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la //
T02D1851-2:31a-27: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor dang lhan cig pa'i
T02D1851-2:31a-28: ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi sku la sogs
T02D1851-2:31a-29: pa la go rims bzhin du dbang bskur ba gsum
T02D1851-2:31a-30: gyis so // byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes pa
T02D1851-2:31a-31: ni sangs rgyas lnga'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo yab
T02D1851-2:31a-32: dang yum zhu ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par sangs
T02D1851-2:31a-33: rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid mthong nas
T02D1851-2:31a-34: gyis so // / de lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul ba dang /
T02D1851-2:31a-35: zhu ba bsdus pa las byung ba'i rang gi sngags
T02D1851-2:31a-36: kyi mtshan mar byung ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis
T02D1851-2:31a-37: rdzogs nas bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang du bskyed cing
T02D1851-2:31a-38: cho ga bzhin du sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis
T02D1851-2:31a-39: brlabs pa bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1851-2:31a-40: // 'bras bu ni de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1851-2:31b-0: de ni @31b zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-1: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1851-2:31b-2: rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing ngo //
T02D1851-2:31b-3: sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa'i phyir rgyal po che'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-4: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mkhyen pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so //
T02D1851-2:31b-5: sku gsum po rtag pa nyid brnyes pa'i phyir sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin to /
T02D1851-2:31b-6: 'di bskyed pa'i don gyi cho ga phal cher thun
T02D1851-2:31b-7: mong nyid du mjug bsdu ba'i phyir sems dpa' thams
T02D1851-2:31b-8: cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te dam
T02D1851-2:31b-9: par gyur pa nyid kyis na sems dpa' ste bzang
T02D1851-2:31b-10: po nyid do // 'di dag ni sems dpa' thams cad yin pas na /
T02D1851-2:31b-11: sems dpa' thams cad ni kun du bzang po ste /
T02D1851-2:31b-12: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu rnams so //
T02D1851-2:31b-13: de rnams bskyed pa ni bskyed pa'i don gyi cho ga ste /
T02D1851-2:31b-14: 'dis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:31b-15: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-16: de nyid ni rdo rje ste dbyer mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:31b-17: de ltar dngos grub kyi mchog gsungs nas dngos grub
T02D1851-2:31b-18: phra mo mi snang ba rnam pa mang po ni
T02D1851-2:31b-19: bzhin bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1851-2:31b-20: / cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1851-2:31b-21: mi snang ba'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma thob pa
T02D1851-2:31b-22: dang dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1851-2:31b-24: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i mchod pa ste /
T02D1851-2:31b-25: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:31b-26: 'jam dpal dang de'i rig pa'i gzugs bskyed pa la sogs pa ni 'dir cho ga yin te /
T02D1851-2:31b-27: rab tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du dngos grub thams
T02D1851-2:31b-28: cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid khong
T02D1851-2:31b-29: du chud pa yin pas 'dir gnyis ka lha nyid
T02D1851-2:31b-30: kyi gzugs su yin gyi sems can gsum pa mi
T02D1851-2:31b-31: snang ba ni dben pa'i don to //
T02D1851-2:31b-32: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1851-2:31b-33: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba ni phan tshun za
T02D1851-2:31b-34: ba ste cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba dang sbyar
T02D1851-2:31b-35: ro // 'dir cho ga ni man ngag las zhes bya'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-36: bza' ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-37: gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni padma la'o //
T02D1851-2:31b-38: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba dang /
T02D1851-2:31b-39: bsreg pa la sogs pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pas so //
T02D1851-2:31b-40: bsngags nas ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-1: zhes bya ba ni mngon par bsngags nas so //
T02D1851-2:32a-2: mi mthong zhes bya ba ni de nyid du zos pas so //
T02D1851-2:32a-3: kha sbyar sbyor ba ni kham phor kha sbyar du gzhug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-4: ri lu'i sgrub pa ni le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-5: de la ga pur ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1851-2:32a-7: gi wang ni khrag dang bcas pa'i sha'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-8: aa ka ru ni bshang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-9: gur kum ni rig ma'i me tog go //
T02D1851-2:32a-10: de ltar 'jam dpal gyi sbyor bas mi snang bar gsungs nas /
T02D1851-2:32a-11: de las gzhan pa'i sbyor bas kyang gsungs pa ni
T02D1851-2:32a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa la sogs pa la
T02D1851-2:32a-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni lha rnams
T02D1851-2:32a-14: kyi'o // byin brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni brtan par byas nas so //
T02D1851-2:32a-15: de 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-16: rdo rje 'gro bar zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med par 'gro ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-17: stong gsum bgrod pa'i zhes bya ba ni logs su'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-18: 'dod khams gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-19: lha'i longs spyod ces bya ba ni lha'i bdag pos bsrungs pa yang ngo //
T02D1851-2:32a-20: brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs kyis bsrungs pa yang ngo //
T02D1851-2:32a-21: gzugs khams gnas pa la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:32a-22: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ngo //
T02D1851-2:32a-23: 'di ltar stobs chen ni thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-24: dam tshig gis mi snang bas des ni rdo rje chen po ni shin tu bzlog par dka' ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-25: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-26: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub mchog dang phra mo bstan zhing thos pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-27: 'phrul pa ni rab tu dgyes par rnam par g-yo ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32a-28: yid la dbang ba rnams zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1851-2:32a-29: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir 'di rnams kyis mnyes pa dang ngo mtshar ston par byed pa yin gyi /
T02D1851-2:32a-30: don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:32a-31: 'di zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1851-2:32a-32: gsang gnas mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gsang ba gsum gyi gzhir gyur pa'i thar pa ste /
T02D1851-2:32a-33: kun du bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:32a-34: de ltar dngos grub mchog dang phra mo la bstod
T02D1851-2:32b-0: nas de dag nyid kyi lam dag la @32b tshigs
T02D1851-2:32b-1: su bcad pa'i phyir phyi mas bstod pa yin te
T02D1851-2:32b-2: chos kyi sgra ni lam gyi tshig yin te /
T02D1851-2:32b-3: gnyi ga dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-4: de la ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni gnyis
T02D1851-2:32b-5: su 'dzin pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1851-2:32b-6: // shin tu dri med ni sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-7: 'dir rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa ni le'u bcu bdun pa las /
T02D1851-2:32b-8: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1851-2:32b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1851-2:32b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor brjod cing /
T02D1851-2:32b-11: rgyas par ni le'u dang po las 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1851-2:32b-12: zhal gsum lta bur snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
T02D1851-2:32b-13: de la dbang bskur ba dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D1851-2:32b-14: ma gsungs pas de dag gi skabs dbye ba'i phyir
T02D1851-2:32b-15: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:32b-16: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-17: ston pa la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i gnas skabs drug yin no //
T02D1851-2:32b-18: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir tshig de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bstan pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:32b-19: dang por rig ma dang bcas pa'i mchog dang po'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor pa ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-20: de nas bskyed pa yin te sgrib pa med pa
T02D1851-2:32b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings dag pa'i tshul du thams cad kyi
T02D1851-2:32b-22: sa bon nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-23: de nas byed pa yin te dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D1851-2:32b-24: po'i tshul du bya ba'i gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:32b-25: ro // de nas mi 'gyur che yin te /
T02D1851-2:32b-26: sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-27: de nas dag pa'i rdo rje yin te /
T02D1851-2:32b-28: sangs rgyas kyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-29: de nas 'di la chos chen po yod pas na chos chen po ste /
T02D1851-2:32b-30: rig pa'i brtul zhugs rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:32b-31: rdo rje'i gsung ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ston pa'o //
T02D1851-2:32b-32: sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1851-2:32b-33: la sangs rgyas kyang yin la rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1851-2:32b-35: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:32b-36: de rnams mnyes 'gyur ni dgyes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32b-37: sems dpa' rdo rje ni mchog dang po'o //
T02D1851-2:32b-38: de'i sbyor ba ni spyi bor yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1851-2:32b-39: des na 'di ni nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa yin te /
T02D1851-2:32b-40: mi bskyod pa nyid kyi mchog dang po la yin
T02D1851-2:32b-41: gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1851-2:33a-1: byang chub kyi sems 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02D1851-2:33a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:33a-3: de rnams mnyes par byed pa ni sangs rgyas rab tu dbye ba dang /
T02D1851-2:33a-4: byang chub kyi rab tu dbye ba ste gang zhig
T02D1851-2:33a-5: rang gi rigs yin pa de des dbang bskur ba'i

T02D1851-2:38b-36: ba can bsam par bya ba de ni 'dir ye

T02D1851-2:38b-39: de bzhin du bu ram gyi kham phor la sogs par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:38b-40: dug gi dam tshig rdo rje ni dug spro ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:38b-41: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:38b-42: gso ba'i rdo rje ni gso bar bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:38b-43: de'i don gyi snying po ni yi ge h'um dkar po'o //
T02D1851-2:38b-44: snying po 'di zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dkar po'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02D1851-2:39a-1: dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas snying ga'i zla bar sa
T02D1851-2:39a-2: bon de nyid kyi las rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D1851-2:39a-3: dkar po de'i lte bar rnam par bsam par bya'o
T02D1851-2:39a-4: // de nas de'i 'od zer dkar po bsil ba'i
T02D1851-2:39a-5: tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par
T02D1851-2:39a-6: // byas la / dug kha dog nag po de de'i snying ga dang lkog ma dang /
T02D1851-2:39a-7: dpral ba dang mgo bor bsdus la langs par zhes bya ba lan gnyis lan gsum bsam par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-8: de nas thams cad snying gar bsdus pa thams cad
T02D1851-2:39a-9: skug pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la bsam
T02D1851-2:39a-10: par bya'o // gang gzhan nad du zhes bya ba ni shu ba dang //
T02D1851-2:39a-12: padma chen po zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu
T02D1851-2:39a-13: med pa dkar po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas a'a:
T02D1851-2:39a-14: dkar po las byung ba'i padma dkar po'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-15: de'i zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyi'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-16: sdud pa na ni zhes bya ba ni byabs pa'i
T02D1851-2:39a-17: skad cig la nad pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer
T02D1851-2:39a-18: rnams rgyas par byas nas bsdus pa na ni'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-19: dam tshig gnag ces bya ba la dam tshig ni 'od zer gyi tshogs so //
T02D1851-2:39a-20: de'i nag po ni dug bsdus pa'i phyir te bsam pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:39a-21: bskul ba na ni zhes bya ba ni khu tshur
T02D1851-2:39a-22: phyi rol du bkrol bas dug thag ring bar drang
T02D1851-2:39a-23: ba na'o // dkar po dang 'dra zhes bya ba
T02D1851-2:39a-24: ni dug las nges par thar pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1851-2:39a-25: ba na'o // ro // gzhan dag na re de'i
T02D1851-2:39a-26: zhes bya ba ni nad gnas su bsdu ba'i sngags
T02D1851-2:39a-27: ba na'o // ro // kyi'o // bskul ba na
T02D1851-2:39a-28: ni phyogs su 'od zer spro ba'i phyir zhes 'chad
T02D1851-2:39a-29: ba na'o // ro // kyi'o // do // gsang ba ni padma'i don gyis so //
T02D1851-2:39a-30: gsang chen ni yi ge a'a: de nyid kyis so //
T02D1851-2:39a-31: ye shes dri med ni 'od zer gyi las kyis so //
T02D1851-2:39a-32: phyi'i nad ni rims la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-33: nang gi nad ni sdig pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-34: nang rnams gso ba rdo rje'i don dang snying po la sogs pa'i don ni sngar dang 'dra'o //
T02D1851-2:39a-35: 'dod pa ni sngags pa ste phul du byung ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:39a-37: de'i yon tan ni khyad par can no //
T02D1851-2:39a-38: de thob par 'gyur ba ni de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:39a-39: yi ge'i tshig ces bya ba la //
T02D1851-2:39a-40: sngags de rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1851-2:39a-41: de 'dra ba'i gzugs ni zhes bya ba la bdag
T02D1851-2:39a-42: nyid kyi gzugs ni de rnams kyi gzugs khro bo
T02D1851-2:39b-0: thams cad gnag pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba @39b 'khrigs
T02D1851-2:39b-1: pa'o // nad kyi rgyu'i sdig pa ni nad de
T02D1851-2:39b-2: de bskul ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lte ba
T02D1851-2:39b-3: la bsams pa'i 'dzin dzik la sogs pa'i sngags kyi
T02D1851-2:39b-4: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D1851-2:39b-5: pa'o // lus dang / ngag dang yid khyab pa rnams kyis bkang ba ste /
T02D1851-2:39b-6: de rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1851-2:39b-7: gang du bskul bas she na /
T02D1851-2:39b-8: rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las te /
T02D1851-2:39b-9: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la sogs pa nyid ni
T02D1851-2:39b-10: sdig pa'i gnas yin la de las de rnams kyis
T02D1851-2:39b-11: so // de'i lus la sogs par gtogs pa'i sdig
T02D1851-2:39b-12: pa nag po yi ge kam gis de'i snying gar
T02D1851-2:39b-13: bsdus pa ni dam tshig kyang yin la de byung
T02D1851-2:39b-14: ba yang de nyid yin no //
T02D1851-2:39b-15: de nas lte ba yan chad du 'od zer 'bar
T02D1851-2:39b-16: ba'i sngags kyis rim gyis bteg cing yi ge kham
T02D1851-2:39b-17: yang snying ga las gong bur byung ste /
T02D1851-2:39b-18: rang gi lha'i rnam pa thams cad dkar por yongs
T02D1851-2:39b-19: su gyur pa'i rang gi sngags snying gar phyin nas
T02D1851-2:39b-20: gnas pa la yi ge kham yang sna rtse las
T02D1851-2:39b-21: byung ba nyid na gnag cing mi sdug pa'i spre'u
T02D1851-2:39b-22: la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas byung
T02D1851-2:39b-24: spre'u dang 'dra bar yongs su gyur pa'i dam tshig la de skad ces bya zhing /
T02D1851-2:39b-25: khyi dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i byung ba'i de la'ang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-26: de byung ba bdag tu rnam par bsam pa ni rnam par brtag par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-27: yang na zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir gnag cing
T02D1851-2:39b-28: mi sdug pa gcer bu yi dags kyi gzugs su
T02D1851-2:39b-30: 'khor lo'am zhes bya ba ni rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag tu'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-31: rdo rje'ang rung zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dag la'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-32: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba rnam par bsams na so //
T02D1851-2:39b-33: rdo rje go 'phang ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i nga rgyal te de'i gnas so //
T02D1851-2:39b-34: lus la sogs pa'i tshogs ni lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams so //
T02D1851-2:39b-35: des ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pas ni'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-36: rab tu rtsol zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya
T02D1851-2:39b-37: pa'i nad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D1851-2:39b-38: // sangs rgyas sprin dag ces bya ba ni phyogs rnams nas lhags te /
T02D1851-2:39b-39: sku la sogs par zhugs nas gnas pa dag go //
T02D1851-2:39b-40: rdo rje rnams kyi rgyal po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de'i sprin bsam par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:39b-41: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms pas so //
T02D1851-2:40a-1: rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D1851-2:40a-2: khros par zhes bya ba la ni'i sgras ni bsnun par ni'o //
T02D1851-2:40a-3: de la zhes bya ba ni spre'u la sogs pa dang 'dra bar byung ba'i nad la'o //
T02D1851-2:40a-4: nad kyi rigs las skyes par gang grags pa de yang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:40a-5: brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni brgya dang brgyad bzlas pa
T02D1851-2:40a-6: sta de'i sbyor bas yin gyi bsam gtan yan gar
T02D1851-2:40a-8: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02D1851-2:40a-9: bdag gi sngags rgyal gyis zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D1851-2:40a-10: gi 'dod pa'i lha dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags
T02D1851-2:40a-11: kyis so // rdo rje'i bsam gtan ni bshad ma thag pa'i bsam gtan no ;
T02D1851-2:40a-12: / dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1851-2:40a-13: las kyi dngos grub phra mo'o //
T02D1851-2:40a-14: de de ltar na dngos grub mchog dang dman pa
T02D1851-2:40a-15: gsungs nas dngos grub phra mo rnams kyang gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:40a-16: yin te // dngos gru tu mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:40a-17: da ni tshogs kyi lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1851-2:40a-18: pas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams
T02D1851-2:40a-19: kyis ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam dag
T02D1851-2:40a-21: mthong nas kyang sngon du bsnyen pa la 'jug par
T02D1851-2:40a-22: 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bstan pa'i skabs dbye
T02D1851-2:40a-23: ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1851-2:40a-24: gsungs te / 'dod dang thar pa ni thabs gsum pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1851-2:40a-25: rdo rje che ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i sku la sogs pa ste /
T02D1851-2:40a-26: dngos grub dman pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:40a-27: de dag rgyas par bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das la /
T02D1851-2:40a-28: 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje tshes //
T02D1851-2:40a-30: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis po de nyid ni ye shes yin la /
T02D1851-2:40a-31: de 'dren par mdzad pas na ye shes kyi kyo ba yang de yin la /
T02D1851-2:40a-32: dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir rmi lam
T02D1851-2:40a-33: chen por snang ba'i 'od po che yang yin pas
T02D1851-2:40a-35: de de ma thag tu ston par mdzad pa nyid
T02D1851-2:40a-36: kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces
T02D1851-2:40a-37: bya'o // de la rang bzhin gyis slu ba'i rmi lam la yongs su ston zhe na //
T02D1851-2:40a-38: 'ga' zhig the tshom du gyur ba de bsal ba'i
T02D1851-2:40a-39: phyir chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1851-2:40a-40: te / gnyis med kyang gnyis su snang bas bslad
T02D1851-2:40a-41: pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam gyis lus can gzhan
T02D1851-2:40b-0: gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi @40b chos rnams
T02D1851-2:40b-1: thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
T02D1851-2:40b-2: kun du brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skye ba
T02D1851-2:40b-3: dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis bzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D1851-2:40b-4: pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de dang ldan
T02D1851-2:40b-5: pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing ngo
T02D1851-2:40b-6: // gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyid kyis dag pa ste //
T02D1851-2:40b-7: stong pa de nyid 'di dag la yod pas na de skad ces bya ste //
T02D1851-2:40b-8: de dag ni gnyis kyis stong pa'i yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:40b-9: ae ma'o de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyis ni
T02D1851-2:40b-10: chos thams cad ni ji ltar rmi lam gyi la
T02D1851-2:40b-11: yid brtan du med pa de bzhin du gzhan dag
T02D1851-2:40b-12: tu yang 'khrul ba tsam yin no ;
T02D1851-2:40b-13: /'on kyang 'khrul ba'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:40b-14: bag chags brtan pos shin tu brtan par gyur pa ni 'khrul pa'i rdo rje yin la /
T02D1851-2:40b-15: de nyid don byed pa la mi slu ba'i phyir
T02D1851-2:40b-16: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul du gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:40b-18: ji ltar yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa yin na yang /
T02D1851-2:40b-19: chu zla dang ni rmi lam bden pa dang nags
T02D1851-2:40b-20: tshal stug po la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa ni 'khrul
T02D1851-2:40b-21: pa'i rdo rje yin pa de bzhin du dngos grub
T02D1851-2:40b-22: kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam de dag kyang yin pa'i
T02D1851-2:40b-23: phyir / 'di la som nyi bya bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1851-2:40b-24: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:40b-25: bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni dmigs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:40b-26: de la brtson pa ni sems brtan par gyur pa can no //
T02D1851-2:40b-27: yang na bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni 'bras bu yin te //
T02D1851-2:40b-28: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1851-2:40b-29: de ni mthong ba de las gzhan pa gang yin bde la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:40b-30: de yang dbye ba mthong zhes bya ba ste dngos grub kyi dbye ba'o //
T02D1851-2:40b-31: rnam pa gnyis ni bdag nyid la sangs rgyas la
T02D1851-2:40b-32: sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba ni dngos grub mchog
T02D1851-2:40b-33: yin la gzhan mthong ba ni dngos grub dman pa
T02D1851-2:40b-34: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:40b-35: de la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:40b-36: de dag gi nang nas so //
T02D1851-2:40b-37: rmi lam gyi dam tshig gi gnas nyid ni rtogs pa'i mtshan ma yin la //
T02D1851-2:40b-38: de dang de'i dngos grub mchog gi yul nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po yang yin pas na //
T02D1851-2:40b-39: rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas so //
T02D1851-2:41a-0: byang chub nyid ye shes kyi mchog yin la de thob pas bdag @41a * //
T02D1851-2:41a-1: nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:41a-2: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por zhes bya ba ni
T02D1851-2:41a-3: rab tu grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog dang
T02D1851-2:41a-4: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pa'o
T02D1851-2:41a-5: // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku yang zhes
T02D1851-2:41a-6: bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1851-2:41a-7: zhing du gtso bo 'ba' zhig tu'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-8: mchod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D1851-2:41a-11: mchod pa byas par zhes bya ba ni rang gi gzugs la'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-12: ye shes chen po ni sku rdo rje la'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje la'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-14: rdo rje chos ni gsung rdo rje la'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-15: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub la nges pa nyid kyi phyir na gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-16: rdo rje yang de yin la bsod nams mdzad pa
T02D1851-2:41a-17: nyid kyi phyir grags pa chen po yang yin pas
T02D1851-2:41a-18: na'o // rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-19: gzugs zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus so //
T02D1851-2:41a-20: 'di 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang
T02D1851-2:41a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phyag byas par gyur
T02D1851-2:41a-22: ba'o // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-23: de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de las skye ba ste /
T02D1851-2:41a-24: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu gzugs su gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:41a-25: lha rnams kyi bu mo dang khye'u dang bu mo
T02D1851-2:41a-26: dag yid du 'ong ba de rnams kyang mngon du
T02D1851-2:41a-28: nye bar gnas pa'am gang na gnas par mthong na'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-29: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:41a-30: bsam gtan rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-31: de la gnas pa ni sems brtan par gyur ba'o //
T02D1851-2:41a-32: de nyid kyis na de las byung ba'i phyir dam
T02D1851-2:41a-33: tshig sbyor ba yang de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1851-2:41a-34: // dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bdag
T02D1851-2:41a-35: nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma ste bsam gtan
T02D1851-2:41a-36: dam tshig can dag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D1851-2:41a-37: // // de bzhin du mchod pa byas pa yang
T02D1851-2:41a-38: zhes bya ba 'dir yang ngo zhe'o zhes bya ba
T02D1851-2:41a-39: ni dngos grub kyi mchog gi mtshan ma yongs su
T02D1851-2:41a-40: rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:41a-41: yang gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dman
T02D1851-2:41a-42: pa'i mtshan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa 'og ma gnyis
T02D1851-2:41a-43: so // rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba la /
T02D1851-2:41a-44: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1851-2:41b-0: 'dir ni de thob pa can gyi byang chub @41b sems dpa' nyid la rdo rje zhes bshad do //
T02D1851-2:41b-1: de yang dag par 'byung ba ni yang dag par skyes pa'o //
T02D1851-2:41b-2: sna tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'am /
T02D1851-2:41b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa chen po la 'jug par gyur pa'am /
T02D1851-2:41b-4: gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum du gyur pa'am /
T02D1851-2:41b-5: bu mo dang khye'u yid du 'ong ba'am /
T02D1851-2:41b-6: de lta bu'i rigs gzhan 'ga' zhig mthong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:41b-7: dri ma med ces bya ba ni bsngags pa'o //
T02D1851-2:41b-8: bla na med par zhes bya ba ni gong na
T02D1851-2:41b-9: med pa nyid de dgag pa dang 'dra ba dang
T02D1851-2:41b-10: ldan pa'i rigs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs
T02D1851-2:41b-11: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra ba zhes
T02D1851-2:41b-12: bya ba'i don yin gyi rnam pa thams cad du
T02D1851-2:41b-15: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las skyes pa ste /
T02D1851-2:41b-18: thugs kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las skyes pa'o //
T02D1851-2:41b-19: gdol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang
T02D1851-2:41b-20: gi tshe gdol ba mo'am khyi mo'am rgod ma la
T02D1851-2:41b-22: bdag nyid sbyor bas rdo rje slob dpon te /
T02D1851-2:41b-23: brtag pa'i blos mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe thugs kyi gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:41b-24: mi bskyod pa ni blo ldan mi bskyod pa'i zhes
T02D1851-2:41b-25: bya ba gang yin pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i

T02D1851-2:50a-27: de'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba 'dus pa rten dang bcas pa bris pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:50a-28: mchog ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje de ni
T02D1851-2:50a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir

T02D1851-2:50a-31: 'chang gis sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1851-2:50a-32: ro // ro // de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:50a-33: dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi zhes bya ba gsang ba gsum po 'dus pa ste /
T02D1851-2:50a-34: de la lha mo rnams ni gsung gi gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:50a-35: khro bo rnams ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:50a-36: lhag ma rnams ni sku'i gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:50a-37: mchog ces bya ba ni gsang ba de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:50a-38: khru ni bcu drug ces bya ba ni logs re
T02D1851-2:50a-39: re zhing khru bzhi'am khru bcu drug pa nyid do
T02D1851-2:50a-40: // 'di ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad yin no //
T02D1851-2:50b-0: dbang bskur ba @50b la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni logs re re zhing khru gang nas brtsams te /
T02D1851-2:50b-1: khru stong gi bar yin no //
T02D1851-2:50b-2: sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas //
T02D1851-2:50b-3: zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag po can zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:50b-4: 'khor lo ni bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni
T02D1851-2:50b-5: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tam rdo rje'i
T02D1851-2:50b-6: thig btab nas ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes par byas
T02D1851-2:50b-7: pa'i re'u cha brgyad pa nang gi dkyil 'khor zlum
T02D1851-2:50b-8: po'o // rdo rje'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni
T02D1851-2:50b-9: thig gdab pa la sogs pa nas dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1851-2:50b-10: mthar thug pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1851-2:50b-11: de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02D1851-2:50b-12: dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan dag
T02D1851-2:50b-13: las spyir gsungs pa'i bya ba 'gal ba med pa
T02D1851-2:50b-14: can 'dir yang bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir cho
T02D1851-2:50b-15: ga'o // gsang ba 'dus pa khyad par du gsungs
T02D1851-2:50b-16: pa ni 'gal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje
T02D1851-2:50b-17: ga'o // ste / cho ga dang lhan cig pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje'i cho ga'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-18: des thig gdab cing bri bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-19: de bzhin du ji srid dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1851-2:50b-20: sngags dang ting nge 'dzin sbyin pa'i bar du rdo rje cho ga yis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:50b-21: de ma lus par yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-22: phyag rgya ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-23: de nyid ni rdo rje'i gnas te /
T02D1851-2:50b-24: sngags rnams kyi de kho na nyid dgod par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-28: yang na mchog ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gzugs so //
T02D1851-2:50b-29: gsang ba ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
T02D1851-2:50b-30: bri bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:50b-31: rnam par snang mdzad gnas ni 'od zer dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-32: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i ngos kyi re'u cha rnams la ste /
T02D1851-2:50b-33: 'od zer dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-34: sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog rnams grva kun du
T02D1851-2:50b-35: zhes bya ba ni sku'i mchog dang gsung gi mchog
T02D1851-2:50b-36: dang / rdo rje thugs kyi mchog dang rdo rje'i
T02D1851-2:50b-37: mchog rnams ni go rims bzhin du spyan dang m'a
T02D1851-2:50b-38: dang / ma k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang /
T02D1851-2:50b-40: de rnams ni go rims bzhin du nang gi dkyil
T02D1851-2:50b-41: 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag la dgod
T02D1851-2:50b-42: par bya'o // khro bo rnams ni zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:50b-43: lha mo rnams ni mang po'i tshig dang sogs zhes bsdus par 'gyur te /
T02D1851-2:51a-1: na mchod pa'i lha mo drug gzung ste /
T02D1851-2:51a-2: bzhi ni phyi'i grva bzhir ro //
T02D1851-2:51a-3: dbang ldan dang me mtshams gnyis su ni /
T02D1851-2:51a-4: reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma
T02D1851-2:51a-5: dag rim bzhin no zhes kun dga' snying po'i zhal
T02D1851-2:51a-7: 'di gnyis rtsa ba'i sgo'i ngos gnyis su ste /
T02D1851-2:51a-8: de dag grva dang nye bas grva zhes bya'o zhes ye shes zhabs kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-9: sgo'i ngos rnams kyang grva yin pas phyi rim gyi grva bcu gnyis su skye mched bcu gnyis te /
T02D1851-2:51a-10: gleng gzhi'i gzhung dang dkyil 'khor chen po'i bstod pa
T02D1851-2:51a-11: las de dag smos pa'i phyir ro zhes gzhan dag
T02D1851-2:51a-12: 'dod do // de la rgyal mo rnams kyi spyan dang /
T02D1851-2:51a-22: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-23: sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni /
T02D1851-2:51a-29: rdo rje bzang po rnams so //
T02D1851-2:51a-30: khro bo rnams kyi 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i tho ba dang /
T02D1851-2:51a-33: rdo rje kha gyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-34: rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas //
T02D1851-2:51a-35: zhes bya ba ni padma dang rdo rje las byung ba'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-36: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang ba gsum mo //
T02D1851-2:51a-37: de spros pa ni sprin te /
T02D1851-2:51a-38: so sor spros pa'i sprin no //
T02D1851-2:51a-39: de rnams kyi bkod pa ni re re zhing mtshan
T02D1851-2:51a-40: ma'i rnam par bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1851-2:51a-41: du dgod pa'o // lhag ma rnams ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-42: rdo rje'i bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba'i don bstan par bsgoms pas so //
T02D1851-2:51a-43: rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1851-2:51a-44: 'di la rgyal po chen po de mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-45: rig pa'i dbang po ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1851-2:51a-46: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rig pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-47: 'od dpag tu med pa de nyid kyi rang gi
T02D1851-2:51a-48: sku dang rang gi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de
T02D1851-2:51a-50: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste //
T02D1851-2:51a-51: de'i yon tan de rnams skyed par mdzad pa ste /
T02D1851-2:51a-52: mthong ba dang 'jug pa la sogs pas de'i sa
T02D1851-2:51a-53: bon btab pa dang gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir ro
T02D1851-2:51a-54: // dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor sar pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:51a-55: 'khor lo chen po ni dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:51b-0: @51b phyag rgya thams cad ni thams cad kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-1: phyag rgya chen po ni mtshan ma chen po'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-2: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid du'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-3: rdo rje'i gnas ni mtshan ma dgod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-4: kun nas sprin ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor spros pa'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-5: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rang gi mtshan ma'i rnam
T02D1851-2:51b-6: pa ji lta ba bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba
T02D1851-2:51b-8: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-9: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-10: rab tu gsangs ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1851-2:51b-11: de ji ltar na mchog tu gsang ba yin zhe na /
T02D1851-2:51b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil
T02D1851-2:51b-13: 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1851-2:51b-14: rnams kyang 'dir bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:51b-15: de yang rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1851-2:51b-16: pa la dkyil 'khor yang lha'i dkyil 'khor yin la
T02D1851-2:51b-17: / gnas kyang de'i rten gyi 'khor lo yin pas na dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so //
T02D1851-2:51b-19: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las byung ste /
T02D1851-2:51b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsum las skyes shing
T02D1851-2:51b-21: gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1851-2:51b-22: don to // rten gyi dkyil 'khor yang sku'i gsang bas bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:51b-23: 'di 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su de 'gyur ba ni bdag por 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D1851-2:51b-25: mtshan ma de'i dbus su legs bris pa'o //
T02D1851-2:51b-26: rdo rje 'dzin mchog ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D1851-2:51b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag
T02D1851-2:51b-28: po nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yang
T02D1851-2:51b-29: de yin la / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1851-2:51b-30: dpa' rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba nyid
T02D1851-2:51b-31: yin pa'i phyir mchog kyang yin pa de ltar na
T02D1851-2:51b-36: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:51b-37: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang byang chub
T02D1851-2:51b-38: sems dpa' rnams kyang kun nas bzang ba'i gzugs can
T02D1851-2:51b-41: khro bo la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs par
T02D1851-2:51b-42: ston pa yin pa la 'dir the tshom mi bya'o
T02D1851-2:52a-0: // mu stegs pa'i lha rnams kyang rgyud 'dir dkyil @52a * //
T02D1851-2:52a-1: 'khor gyi bdag po ma yin zhing dkyil 'khor pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1851-2:52a-2: tshigs su bcad pa ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang
T02D1851-2:52a-3: yin pa'o zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khor de dang
T02D1851-2:52a-4: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1851-2:52a-5: de'i sras ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsungs /
T02D1851-2:52a-6: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gnas ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-7: de'i ye shes dang de'i gsang ba ni don dam pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-8: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba ni thig gis bkod pa dang tshon dgye ba'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-9: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-10: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba rnams so //
T02D1851-2:52a-11: de gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge gsum po la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-12: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-13: de'i sngags ni de shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-14: snying po'i tshig ni de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-15: yi ge ni yi ge gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-16: gnas ni rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:52a-17: de bas na yi ge gsum po 'di dag gis
T02D1851-2:52a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba
T02D1851-2:52a-19: dag pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1851-2:52a-20: thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba gang yin pa
T02D1851-2:52a-21: de dang de dag slob dpon rang nyid kyis rtag
T02D1851-2:52a-23: de'i phyir rdo rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:52a-24: sngags ni rang gi lha nyid do //
T02D1851-2:52a-25: sngon du bsnyen pas brtan par byas pa'i sems ni sems dpa'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-26: yun ring por rig pa'i brtul zhugs can nyid yin
T02D1851-2:52a-27: pa'i phyir sngags sgrub pa'i sems dpa' 'di la yod
T02D1851-2:52a-28: pas na sngags kyi sems dpa' ste /
T02D1851-2:52a-29: bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D1851-2:52a-30: mthar phyin pa can gyi sgrub pa po la sngags
T02D1851-2:52a-31: kyi sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
T02D1851-2:52a-33: tshon rtsi dgye ba rang nyid kyis mi bya'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-34: byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' //
T02D1851-2:52a-35: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed na /
T02D1851-2:52a-36: de'i byang chub ni thob par dka'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:52a-37: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa ;
T02D1851-2:52a-38: de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas //
T02D1851-2:52a-39: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni bshang ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
T02D1851-2:52a-40: tshul ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i lha dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-41: de dag shes pa yin pas na shes pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52a-42: sngags kyi lha rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:52b-0: rigs kyi tshig gcig pa @52b can no //
T02D1851-2:52b-1: lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u dang bu mo dag
T02D1851-2:52b-2: lhag par gnas pa ci rigs par lha dang lha
T02D1851-2:52b-3: mo'i gzugs de dag la ye shes kyi lha gnyis
T02D1851-2:52b-5: bcug nas so zhes bya ba'i dan to //
T02D1851-2:52b-6: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas ni mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-7: rnam par brtag pa ni de dag nyid 'dra ba ste /
T02D1851-2:52b-8: gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-9: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams go
T02D1851-2:52b-10: rims bzhin du lha dbab par bya ba gnyis po
T02D1851-2:52b-11: go rims gang dang gang yin pa de ni rgyal
T02D1851-2:52b-12: chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1851-2:52b-13: sku'i dkyil 'khor gnas zhes bya ba ni lha gnyis po de dag nyid de /
T02D1851-2:52b-14: go rims bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:52b-15: rang gi chos ma dang zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D1851-2:52b-16: gi btsun mo 'dod chags dga' ma dang lhan cig
T02D1851-2:52b-17: go // gzhung la la las ni rang gi chos ma yin zhes 'byung ste /
T02D1851-2:52b-18: de ni byed pa'i tshig med pa can yin no //
T02D1851-2:52b-19: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni lha de dag gi snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-20: sngags rnams thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba
T02D1851-2:52b-21: ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i de
T02D1851-2:52b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-24: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-25: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dbab pa byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1851-2:52b-26: de ltar byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:52b-27: yid la dbang ba nyid ces bya ba ni lha drug go //
T02D1851-2:52b-28: gshegs te zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du bab pa'o //
T02D1851-2:52b-29: gsang ba rnams kyi mchog ces bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:52b-30: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bris pa'i dgos
T02D1851-2:52b-31: pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa'i mchod
T02D1851-2:52b-32: pa'o // sngags kyi dngos grub kyis zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir grub pa ste /
T02D1851-2:52b-33: sngags kyi sems pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:52b-34: rdo rje bri ba'i gsang ba ni rdo rje gsang ba ste /
T02D1851-2:52b-35: sku rdo rje la sogs pa babs pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:52b-36: rmad po che zhes bya ba ni de mthong na
T02D1851-2:52b-37: lha dang mi rnams kyi yid dga' bar byed pa'o
T02D1851-2:52b-38: // khro bo'i rgyal po ste gnod mdzes rdo rjes so //
T02D1851-2:52b-39: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni rang dang rang
T02D1851-2:52b-40: gi gnas su bkod la mig dang sku la sogs
T02D1851-2:52b-41: pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur bar byas
T02D1851-2:53a-1: / dam tshig gi mchod pa dus gsum pa ni thun mtshams su'o //
T02D1851-2:53a-2: rdo rje dri med gsum dag gis ni rdo rje can te de ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
T02D1851-2:53a-3: rdo rje yi ni sbyor bas bya //
T02D1851-2:53a-4: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba nyid kyis so //
T02D1851-2:53a-5: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni lha bshos rnams so //
T02D1851-2:53a-6: sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams so //
T02D1851-2:53a-7: bshang ba la sogs pa ni mi'i bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1851-2:53a-8: tshigs su bcad pa ni lnga pa'i khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:53a-9: des de ltar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri ba de bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:53a-10: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yang ma grub tu zin kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02D1851-2:53a-11: de'i phyir ma grub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas thig
T02D1851-2:53a-12: gdab pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1851-2:53a-13: / de'i tshe sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil
T02D1851-2:53a-14: 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du

T02D1851-2:55b-23: sgrib pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir 'dis dbang bskur bar byed pas na dbang bskur ba'o //

T02D1851-2:55b-25: phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang dngos grub thams cad kyi'o //

T02D1851-2:55b-27: sbyin zhes bya ba la slob ma 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1851-2:55b-28: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1851-2:55b-29: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi gsang pa gsum te /
T02D1851-2:55b-30: gsang ba 'dus par ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1851-2:55b-31: ji lta bu zhig ce na /

T02D1851-2:55b-33: ni lha thams cad kyi rdo rje las byung ba

T02D1851-2:55b-40: de yang sku'i dbang bskur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:55b-41: ram ster ba po du ma yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1851-2:55b-42: // tshigs su bcad pa gang gis gsol ba 'debs

T02D1851-2:56a-3: gsung ba ni thabs kyi de kho na nyid de

T02D1851-2:56a-24: ni deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

T02D1851-2:56a-37: de nas chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang

T02D1851-2:57a-37: nyid ni sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D1851-2:57b-23: lhan cig 'khod ces bya ba ni lhan cig gnas pa ste /

T02D1851-2:58a-0: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags @58a * //

T02D1851-2:58a-4: gzhung kha cig la ni aa kham pa'o //
T02D1851-2:58a-5: phyag na rdo rje ni bgegs mthar byed dam /
T02D1851-2:58a-7: phyag na padmo ni padma mthar byed do //

T02D1851-2:58a-16: te / de rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //

T02D1851-2:58a-18: gzhug pa'i snying gar nyi ma 'bar ba la gnas
T02D1851-2:58a-19: pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can gyi mi bskyod

T02D1851-2:58a-26: rdo rje thams cad ni ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //

T02D1851-2:58a-28: rtse gsum la sogs pa sgros pa yis so //

T02D1851-2:58a-31: gsang ba'i snying ga'i nyi ma la bsam par bya

T02D1851-2:58a-37: la bdag la grub par gyur cig ces bya ba'i

T02D1851-2:58a-42: nyams dga' ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs
T02D1851-2:58a-43: su bcad pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:58b-0: mngag gzhug pa grub par gyur nas @58b cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1851-2:58b-1: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:58b-2: rdo rje can nyid byang chub ste //
T02D1851-2:58b-3: de yi don gyi 'khor rnams so //
T02D1851-2:58b-6: thas 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:58b-7: de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D1851-2:58b-8: sangs rgyas sa yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:58b-10: dam tshig rdo rje'i bzhad pa yang de yin la chen po yang yin pas na'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-11: de la dam tshig ni dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-12: de'i rdo rje ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-13: de'i bzhad pa ni snying gar gnas pa'i yi gi
T02D1851-2:58b-14: a'om: las byung ba'i mdung la sogs pa'i tshogs so
T02D1851-2:58b-15: // de yang nam mkha' khyab pas na chen po yin te /
T02D1851-2:58b-16: ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs kyi snying po
T02D1851-2:58b-17: skul bar byed pa nyid kyi khyab par byed pa
T02D1851-2:58b-19: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-20: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa rnam pa gnyis las gcig bshad nas gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1851-2:58b-21: de la zhes bya ba la sgos pa gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:58b-22: la de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin
T02D1851-2:58b-23: du bskyed pa'i dam tshig gi mnga' gzhug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-24: mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-25: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D1851-2:58b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sgos pa la mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1851-2:58b-28: 'od dpag tu med pa dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-29: dgod pa zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang lkog
T02D1851-2:58b-30: ma dang spyi bor 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can 'di
T02D1851-2:58b-31: rnams rnam par dgod pa yis so //
T02D1851-2:58b-32: bskul zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir sad par bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-33: de la zhes bya ba ni gsang ba gsum dgod par byas par ro //
T02D1851-2:58b-34: rdo rje ni de nyid kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-35: de rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni de
T02D1851-2:58b-36: dag nyid kyi snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi
T02D1851-2:58b-37: sprul pa rnams re re zhing nam mkha' khyab pa'i
T02D1851-2:58b-38: ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs gsum pa'o //
T02D1851-2:58b-39: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ni dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ste /
T02D1851-2:58b-40: dam tshig ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo yin la de'i gnas ni las rnams so //
T02D1851-2:58b-41: dam tshig bskul ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i rang gi de kho na nyid kyis sad pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-1: gtong ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i 'od zer pho nya'i gnas su gyur pa rnams gtong ba'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-2: dam tshig bod pa ni 'od zer de dag nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-3: dam tshig bcing ba ni bkug pa de nyid yi
T02D1851-2:59a-4: ge a'a: la sogs pa la bsdus te 'jog pa'o
T02D1851-2:59a-5: // de nad dam tshig gi tshig 'di dag gis ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1851-2:59a-6: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:59a-7: ye shes kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1851-2:59a-8: yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i
T02D1851-2:59a-9: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni nam mkha'i khams
T02D1851-2:59a-10: kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir mkha' dbyings so
T02D1851-2:59a-11: // mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir rgya chen no //
T02D1851-2:59a-12: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-13: rnam pa thams cad du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1851-2:59a-14: rnam pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir chos rnams
T02D1851-2:59a-16: de gong bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum du bsdus pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-17: rdo rje nyid ni ngo mtshar du gyur ba'i tshul can nyid yin te /
T02D1851-2:59a-18: de dang ldan pas na rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can te /
T02D1851-2:59a-19: nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1851-2:59a-20: kyi bu gcig pa ni gsang ba gsum bsdus pa
T02D1851-2:59a-21: de rnams kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:59a-23: dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-24: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis ni bcom ldan la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-25: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa 'di la yang de nyid 'bras bu yin te /
T02D1851-2:59a-26: gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:59a-28: rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:59a-29: 'ong gi sgras ni lha dang mi'i dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-30: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan no //
T02D1851-2:59a-31: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid ni rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1851-2:59a-32: de dbang du byas nas mdun du 'jog pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-33: rdo rje 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba
T02D1851-2:59a-34: dmar po la gnas pa sku dang thugs dang na
T02D1851-2:59a-35: bza' dang rgyan dang phreng ba dmar po'o //
T02D1851-2:59a-36: mda' lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub
T02D1851-2:59a-37: par bya ba kha dog dmar zhing gos med pas
T02D1851-2:59a-38: 'jigs par 'gyur ba mdun du bsams te /
T02D1851-2:59a-39: de nyid 'ben du byas nas tsam las byung ba'i
T02D1851-2:59a-40: gzhu dmar po lag pa g-yon pas gzung la gzhu'i
T02D1851-2:59b-0: @59b rgyud 'dran [?] par byed pa can sor mo
T02D1851-2:59b-1: lnga'i nang na gnas pa'i yi ge ram las byung
T02D1851-2:59b-2: ba'i mda' autpala dmar po kha ma bye ba'i mde'u
T02D1851-2:59b-3: dang ldan pa'i mda' lnga ltong 'dzin par byed pa'i
T02D1851-2:59b-4: g-yas kyi khu tshur cod pan gyi mthar 'jog pa
T02D1851-2:59b-5: ni mda' lnga'i sbyor bdag gis ni dbu rgyan rtse
T02D1851-2:59b-6: mor ro // des yang dag spro ba ni mda'
T02D1851-2:59b-7: lnga las mda' lnga 'byung zhing spro ba bsam par
T02D1851-2:59b-8: mor ro // bya'o // de nas mda' las byung bas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1851-2:59b-9: gnas lnga dag tu rab tu dbab pa ste /
T02D1851-2:59b-10: bsgrub par bya ba'i mig gnyis dang /
T02D1851-2:59b-11: snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams su'o //
T02D1851-2:59b-12: rdo rje khro bos zhes bya ba ni 'bar zhing
T02D1851-2:59b-13: chags pa dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um ngam yi
T02D1851-2:59b-15: brgyal ba ni myos te dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:59b-16: de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:59b-17: byis pa'i gzigs kyang de yin la /
T02D1851-2:59b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo yang yin pas na byis pa'i blo ste 'jam dpal lo //
T02D1851-2:59b-19: de'i grags chen ni grags pa dang ldan pa'i mda'o //
T02D1851-2:59b-20: gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis zhes bya ba ni gnad du bsnun pa yis so //
T02D1851-2:59b-21: sngags rnams kun ni lha thams cad do //
T02D1851-2:59b-22: de rnams kyi rab gsang ba ni nang gi nor ro //
T02D1851-2:59b-23: sgrub pa pos don bya ba yin la blo ni
T02D1851-2:59b-24: bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyi bsam pa yin pas
T02D1851-2:59b-25: na don gyi blo yin zhing de gang las dbyer
T02D1851-2:59b-26: mi phyed par 'gyur ba de ni rdo rje don
T02D1851-2:59b-27: gyi blo ste / rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D1851-2:59b-28: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1851-2:59b-30: mchog dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
T02D1851-2:59b-31: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1851-2:59b-32: ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na /
T02D1851-2:59b-33: sngags kyi rdo rje h'um la sogs te /
T02D1851-2:59b-34: dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad las byung ba'i zla
T02D1851-2:59b-35: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gsal ba'i yi ge thams cad
T02D1851-2:59b-36: kyis yongs su bskor ba mchog dang po'i snying po
T02D1851-2:59b-38: de'i dbus su snying po de nyid do //
T02D1851-2:59b-39: sogs pa smos pas ni spro ba dang bsdu ba
T02D1851-2:59b-40: dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed pa 'dod chags chen
T02D1851-2:59b-41: po'i tshul la sogs pa'i rim gyis dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1851-2:59b-42: bdag po dang / dkyil 'khor pa rnams sprul pa /
T02D1851-2:59b-43: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa de nams kyi rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgoms te /
T02D1851-2:59b-44: sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang /
T02D1851-2:60a-0: ye shes sems dpa' dang cod pan la @60a * //
T02D1851-2:60a-2: rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba ci rigs par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:60a-3: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-4: bstan zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-5: aom ni mig gi dbus bsams nas //
T02D1851-2:60a-6: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la zhes sngar gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-7: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-8: bkres skom zhes bya ba ni bkres pa dang skom pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1851-2:60a-9: nyon mongs ches zhes bya ba ni ngal ba chen po yin te /
T02D1851-2:60a-10: de rgyur gyur pas rnam bsams nas te zhi ba'i don du'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-11: don rnams thams cad 'byor zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:60a-12: bam zhes bya ba ni bum pa dkar po lta bu'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-13: kha'i nang du zhes bya ba ni ma mchu dang 'byar zhing cung zad khas spub pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-14: bza' bar bya ba kun zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-15: yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste //
T02D1851-2:60a-16: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1851-2:60a-17: can phyed bkab pa'i thig le'i gzugs can gyi yid
T02D1851-2:60a-18: bzhin gyi nor bus rnam par brgyan pa ste /
T02D1851-2:60a-19: bum pa bzang po nyid yi pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:60a-20: ye shes rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-21: de las byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-22: zhi ba ste nyon mongs pa med pa bkres pa
T02D1851-2:60a-23: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba gang yin pa
T02D1851-2:60a-24: de 'dra ba'i yi ge bam bsams nas so //
T02D1851-2:60a-25: aom ni lce la 'dug par bsam //
T02D1851-2:60a-26: lce'i rtse mo la yi ge aom bsam pa kha der gtad par bya ste /
T02D1851-2:60a-27: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa rngub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:60a-28: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje 'di nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1851-2:60a-29: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-30: zas kyi yid bzhin nor bu'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-31: dpa' bo chen po'i rdo rje yang de yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pa ste /
T02D1851-2:60a-32: de'i rdo rje bsgoms pa ni sku gsum bsgom pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-33: de'i dam tshig gi mchog ni sa bon gyi mchog go //
T02D1851-2:60a-34: rdo rje gsung las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung la sogs pa las so //
T02D1851-2:60a-35: bsgom pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1851-2:60a-36: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:60a-37: rdo rje gsum ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang bam gyi'o //
T02D1851-2:60a-38: de rnams kyi sku'i sbyor ba ni nam mkha' khyab
T02D1851-2:60a-39: par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sku bsdus pa ste des
T02D1851-2:60a-40: bskyed pa'o // des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1851-2:60b-0: skabs @60b nyid yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rdo rje'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-1: ser ba zhes bya ba ni gser lta bu'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-2: rdo rje 'gying ba zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-3: rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pas rdo rje dang /
T02D1851-2:60b-4: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-5: 'di ni rnam par bsam zhes bya ba ni sa
T02D1851-2:60b-6: bon gyi yi ge bam snying ga'i zla ba rdo
T02D1851-2:60b-7: rje'i lte ba la gnas pa zla ba'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-8: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i yi ge bam gyi rnam par bsams nas so //
T02D1851-2:60b-9: thams cad brtsam par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub
T02D1851-2:60b-10: par bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyang brtsams nas
T02D1851-2:60b-11: de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar
T02D1851-2:60b-12: dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:60b-13: rdo rje dpa' bo'i rlabs ni brtson pas gzengs bstod
T02D1851-2:60b-14: pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer te de rnams kyi phreng
T02D1851-2:60b-15: ba'o // de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-17: kun nas dbyangs ni sngags thams cad de sangs rgyas
T02D1851-2:60b-18: dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1851-2:60b-19: // de'i rdo rje ni tsunda'i rnam par bsdus pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-20: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-21: rdo rje chen mo ni skul byed ma de nyid
T02D1851-2:60b-22: de de'i bsgoms pa'i don gyi tshig ni sa bon
T02D1851-2:60b-23: no // rdo rje gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni
T02D1851-2:60b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1851-2:60b-25: no // dpa' rnams so // lus dang ngag dang
T02D1851-2:60b-26: sems zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang padma dang
T02D1851-2:60b-28: rab tu bsgom zhes bya ba ni rab tu brtags nas bsgom pa ste /
T02D1851-2:60b-29: nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba thabs
T02D1851-2:60b-30: kyis 'khyud pa padma dkar po dang ral gri dang
T02D1851-2:60b-31: nor bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
T02D1851-2:60b-33: sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni snying ga'i nyi
T02D1851-2:60b-34: ma la bzlas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge tsum ma
T02D1851-2:60b-35: / yang na aom tsa le tsu le tsunde sv'a h'a bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-36: de la sdig pa rnams bskyod cong sel bar mdzad pas na tsa le'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-37: de rnams kyang mi phyed pa'i phyir ldem zhing yang dag par ldem pas na tsu le'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-38: dkar po'i chos rnams kyis 'bar bar byed cing gsal bar byed pas na tsunde'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-39: tsunda'i don gyi yi ge tsum mam //
T02D1851-2:60b-40: yang na tsa le tsu le tsunde'i don gyi yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1851-2:60b-41: rdo rje ni sngags thams cad do //
T02D1851-2:60b-42: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsdus pa ste /
T02D1851-2:60b-43: de nyid ni skul byed ma'o //
T02D1851-2:60b-44: de'i ye shes ni sa bon te /
T02D1851-2:61a-1: la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-3: bsam pa thams cad ni nor thams cad kyi bsam pa'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-4: de'i rdo rje'i longs spyod ni nges par rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02D1851-2:61a-6: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-7: ting nge 'dzin de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-9: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:61a-10: rdo rje bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni zla ba
T02D1851-2:61a-11: de la sa bon gang ba de'i lte bar rdo
T02D1851-2:61a-13: sangs rgyas kun zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02D1851-2:61a-14: dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni yi ge dzam la bsdu ba'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-15: dzam bha ni gnod sbyin chen po zhes bya ba ni ser po'am nag po zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02D1851-2:61a-16: zla ba'i 'od yod pa mi thung gsus pa che
T02D1851-2:61a-17: ba rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa lag pa
T02D1851-2:61a-18: g-yas gnyis na sa bon gang ba dang ral gri
T02D1851-2:61a-19: thogs pa / g-yon pa gnyis na rin po che skyug pa'i ne'u le dang padma thogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-20: thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang rdo rje can ni sku rdo rje can la sogs pa ste /
T02D1851-2:61a-22: gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni cod pan gyi steng gi bar snang la'o //
T02D1851-2:61a-23: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni lnga po yang
T02D1851-2:61a-24: rang gi rig pa rjes su mnyes pa'i cho gas
T02D1851-2:61a-25: gnas pa'o // rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu zhes bya
T02D1851-2:61a-26: ba ni de dag nyid kyi dga' ba byung ba'i
T02D1851-2:61a-28: dbu la zhes bya ba ni spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:61a-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
