T02D1851-2:101b-10: gdan bzhi la gnas pa'i sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi'o //
T02D1851-2:101b-11: spyi bor dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni ci rigs par zhe sdang rdo rje la sogs pas so //
T02D1851-2:101b-12: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni ci rigs par rigs kyi rig pa'o //
T02D1851-2:101b-13: de rnams zhes bya ba ni 'dir sngags kyi skyes bu gang yin pa de rnams kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:101b-14: kun du ni rgyas btab pa de tsam ma lus par ro //
T02D1851-2:101b-15: rnam par phye nas rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya
T02D1851-2:101b-16: ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la gang yin pa'i
T02D1851-2:101b-17: sbyor ba de'i rig pa dang sbyor ba las byung
T02D1851-2:101b-19: bdag byin brlab sogs de bzhin te //
T02D1851-2:101b-20: zhes bya ba la de'i sbyor ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1851-2:101b-21: de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni lus can te /
T02D1851-2:101b-22: ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis byin
T02D1851-2:101b-23: gyis brlabs pa lus dang bcas pa de rnams kyang
T02D1851-2:101b-24: de dang 'dra bar de nyid kyi sbyor ba yin
T02D1851-2:101b-25: gyi // gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:101b-26: rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
T02D1851-2:101b-27: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi rig pa dang
T02D1851-2:101b-28: sbyor ba yod du zin kyang brgyad pa de dag
T02D1851-2:101b-29: gis rgyas btab pa yod pa ma yin no zhes
T02D1851-2:101b-31: de la lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab bam lhan
T02D1851-2:101b-32: cig skyes pa'i thabs dang bdag byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1851-2:101b-33: la sogs pa ni lus med pa dang dbu rgyan
T02D1851-2:101b-34: ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes dkyil 'khor rnams rgyas
T02D1851-2:101b-35: btab pa'o // phyag rgya chen po dang yang dag
T02D1851-2:101b-36: par sbyor ba'i gnas kyi mchog rnams ni spyan la
T02D1851-2:101b-37: sogs pa la yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir te
T02D1851-2:101b-38: btab pa'o // / sbyor ba yi ni sngags rnams kun //
T02D1851-2:101b-39: spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shes //
T02D1851-2:101b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi rig ma rnams la yang //
T02D1851-2:101b-42: rdo rje spyan gyi gzugs la sogs //
T02D1851-2:101b-43: gtsug tor mnyes par byed par bshad //
T02D1851-2:102a-0: @102a * // bdag po zhes bya ba ni gcig pu ste /
T02D1851-2:102a-1: dkyil 'khor las phyi rol pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:102a-2: rdo rje gcig pu'i zhes bya ba ni rig ma dang 'khyud pa can no //
T02D1851-2:102a-3: re re zhes bya ba ni rig mas ma 'khyud pa ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-4: don gyis ni rig ma dang bcas pa la rig pa dang bcas pa nyid do //
T02D1851-2:102a-5: snying gar phyag rgya sngags tsam gyis //
T02D1851-2:102a-6: rgyas btab par ni brtag par bya //
T02D1851-2:102a-7: de rnams kyi snying ga rnams su ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-11: sems kyi gnas rnams kyi phyag rgya ni snying gar phyag rgya'o //
T02D1851-2:102a-12: rang rig rim gyis zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1851-2:102a-13: ye shes dang sku gsung thugs dag gi rim gyis so //
T02D1851-2:102a-14: yang dag par sbyor ba can lus dang bcas pa
T02D1851-2:102a-15: dang lus med pa can snying ga'i phyag rgya rnams
T02D1851-2:102a-16: la sngags ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na //
T02D1851-2:102a-17: de'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la 'bras bu ni gdan te /
T02D1851-2:102a-19: zla ba yin la rgyu ni de'i dbus kyi mtshan ma ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-20: de'i lte ba'i nyi ma'am zla ba yin la //
T02D1851-2:102a-21: de'i dbus su sngags zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:102a-22: chos 'byung ba bsgom pa ni bcu pa las //
T02D1851-2:102a-24: zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa de'i dri ba zhus
T02D1851-2:102a-25: pa'i lan ni longs spyod bzhi zhes bya ba la
T02D1851-2:102a-27: 'di ni nye ba'i grub pa'i drag shul gyi sbyor
T02D1851-2:102a-28: ba bya bar mi nus pa rnams kyi cho ga'o
T02D1851-2:102a-29: // rig pa'i skyes bu yang de yin la rdo rje can yang yin pa ste /
T02D1851-2:102a-30: de bsgom par bya zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
T02D1851-2:102a-31: gang du zhe na gru gsum ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-32: chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang du zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:102a-33: ji ltar gru gsum zhe na //
T02D1851-2:102a-34: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis so //
T02D1851-2:102a-35: ji lta bu'i rdo rje can zhe na //
T02D1851-2:102a-36: longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan pa ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-37: dga' ma bzhi'i rig mas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1851-2:102a-38: dbus su zhes bya ba ni rdo rje can gyi snying gar 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
T02D1851-2:102a-39: de ru zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1851-2:102a-40: rtsibs kun la ni zhes bya ba ni rtsibs bcu po rnams la'o //
T02D1851-2:102a-41: ye shes bcu ni gzung ba dang /
T02D1851-2:102a-42: 'dod chags la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //
T02D1851-2:102a-43: de'i bdag nyid can ni de'i rang bzhin du 'byung ba ste //
T02D1851-2:102a-44: 'di dag la rang gi sa bon las rang gi
T02D1851-2:102a-45: mtshan ma'i rnam par 'byung ba yod pas na de
T02D1851-2:102b-2: lcags kyu dbyig pa mdung dang ni //
T02D1851-2:102b-3: ral gri mtshams su dgod par bya //
T02D1851-2:102b-4: 'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g-yo //
T02D1851-2:102b-6: khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas btab bo //
T02D1851-2:102b-7: zhes phyag rgya dgod pa zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1851-2:102b-8: /'khor lo'i lte bar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mtshan
T02D1851-2:102b-9: ma sa bon las byung ba lte bar sa bon
T02D1851-2:102b-10: can du don gyis shes par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-11: 'di ltar lha bcu gcig gis byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1851-2:102b-12: shin tu mi g-yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor ba'i
T02D1851-2:102b-13: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa de nyid do //
T02D1851-2:102b-14: rnal 'byor pas 'gog pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-15: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rdzogs pa'i 'gog pa'i rdo rje ste brtan par 'gog pas so //
T02D1851-2:102b-16: shin tu gsal bar snang ba nyid kyi phyir mchog tu'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-17: dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes par gyur pas so //
T02D1851-2:102b-18: rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spro bas khro bo'i mtshan
T02D1851-2:102b-19: ma rnams las khro bo'i rnam par 'bar ba nam
T02D1851-2:102b-20: mkha' khyab par byed pa rgyun gyis yang dang yang
T02D1851-2:102b-22: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mjug sdud pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:102b-23: chos 'byung ye shes de ni ye shes bcur 'byung ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-24: dri ma med pa ni nyes pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:102b-25: zhi ba ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:102b-27: bsgoms pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la //
T02D1851-2:102b-28: bsgoms pas ni bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-29: sangs rgyas spyan ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems nye bar sgrub pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1851-2:102b-30: srung ba'i 'khor lo ni phyi'i khro bo'i gzugs bcu
T02D1851-2:102b-31: po nyid kyis byin gyis brlab par bsgom par bya'o
T02D1851-2:102b-32: // sdom pa ni phal cher lnga pa dang dgu
T02D1851-2:102b-33: pa dang bcu bdun pa las gsungs pa de dri
T02D1851-2:102b-34: ba zhus pa'i lan ni rdo rje can gyis zhes
T02D1851-2:102b-35: bya la sogs pa gsungs pa la //
T02D1851-2:102b-36: 'da' bar mi bya ba'i don gyis na dam tshig yin la //
T02D1851-2:102b-37: bgegs bzlog pa'i don gyis na sdom pa yin te //
T02D1851-2:102b-38: rnam grangs kyi dbye bas yan gyi don gyi dbye
T02D1851-2:102b-39: bas ni ma yin pa de'i phyir sdom pa'i sgras
T02D1851-2:102b-41: dam tshig dang sdom pa dag gis ni lan gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:103a-0: rim pa gnyis ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis @103a * //
T02D1851-2:103a-2: / de la rang gi lha la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1851-2:103a-3: dang phyag rgya mtshan la sogs pa yongs su gyur
T02D1851-2:103a-4: pa las nyin re zhing yongs su bskyed pa ni
T02D1851-2:103a-5: bskyed pa ste // de la gnas pas na bskyed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-6: rdzogs pa ni kun du spyod pa ste //
T02D1851-2:103a-7: thabs gsum gyis 'bras bu rtogs so //
T02D1851-2:103a-8: thabs gong ma bzhi pa'i bsgom pa brtan por gyur
T02D1851-2:103a-9: pas dngos po thams cad la ci rigs par skyes
T02D1851-2:103a-10: shing rdzogs par skad cig re re zhing mthong bar
T02D1851-2:103a-11: gyur ba kun du spyod pa'i don ni rdzogs pa'o
T02D1851-2:103a-12: // rdzogs pa de nyid las dang po las kyang
T02D1851-2:103a-13: lhag par mos pas dmigs pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1851-2:103a-14: // pa'o // de ltar rim pa gnyis la brten
T02D1851-2:103a-15: nas bshad pa yin gyi rim pa gcig gis ni
T02D1851-2:103a-16: // pa'o // ma yin no // sgrub pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-17: 'bad pa ni nyams su len pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-18: dam tshig dang sdom pa gang yin pa ni sngar rgyas par bshad pa nyid do //
T02D1851-2:103a-19: de ni rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin te //
T02D1851-2:103a-20: bskyed pa'i rim pa la mngon par rtogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gsum mo //
T02D1851-2:103a-21: de'i nyams su len pa ni dus mtshams dang langs nas mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1851-2:103a-22: dam tshig ni sbyang ba dang spar ba dang spro la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-23: de nyams su len pa ni bag med pa dang spang ba dang bsam gtan gyis kyang ngo //
T02D1851-2:103a-24: rdzogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni kun du spyod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-25: nyams su len pa ni skad cig cing rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
T02D1851-2:103a-26: dam tshig ni lhag par mos pa tsam gyis sbyang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-27: dam tshig gi nyams su len pa ni rang gi sku'am lus gzhan gyis kyang ci rigs par ro //
T02D1851-2:103a-28: las dang po pa rnams kyi yang bskyed pa bzhin te sdom pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103a-29: dbang bskur bas kun du bzang po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bcu bdun pa las 'byung la //
T02D1851-2:103a-30: kun du bzang po de yang dpal mchog dang po la sogs par /
T02D1851-2:103a-31: snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
T02D1851-2:103a-33: de phyir nga ni kun du bzang //
T02D1851-2:103a-35: de la snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T02D1851-2:103a-39: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ches //
T02D1851-2:103a-40: sems can don mdzad ji lta bu //
T02D1851-2:103a-41: zhes bya ba 'di dris pa yin te //
T02D1851-2:103a-42: de'i lan ni gzugs dang zhes bya ba gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:103a-43: la 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni so sor sdud
T02D1851-2:103a-44: pa la gdan gyi rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1851-2:103b-0: bde ba ni @103b bde ba bskyed pa'i bsil ba dang dkar ba'am dmar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-1: sdug bsngal ni dro zhing dmar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-2: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid ni zhi zhing dkar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-3: snying la zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-4: skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-5: 'dod chags ni tshim par byed pa'i kha dog ste /
T02D1851-2:103b-10: zhe sdang ni khro zhing gnag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-11: mun pa ni zhi zhing dkar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-12: chags pa'i rang bzhin ni sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1851-2:103b-13: rdo rje ni sems kyi phra mo'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-14: dam tshig ni spros pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:103b-15: 'dod par byas pas na 'dod pa ste byang chub bo //
T02D1851-2:103b-16: dam tshig mtshungs pa ni dam tshig gi rjes su byed pa ste /
T02D1851-2:103b-18: rnam pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'i ye shes te //
T02D1851-2:103b-19: don byed do zhes bya ba 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel to //
T02D1851-2:103b-20: rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi ye shes te //
T02D1851-2:103b-22: kun 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i ye shes te //
T02D1851-2:103b-23: phra mo gsum gyi rang bzhin nor bu'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-24: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid ni de nyid nye bar mtshon pa ste //
T02D1851-2:103b-25: gang du ye shes gsum po yod pas de'i yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1851-2:103b-26: bdag ni rang gi sngags so / gang zhes bya ba ni der gnyi bde ba ste /
T02D1851-2:103b-27: 'di ni yi ge gsum gyi bdag ces bya'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-28: byed pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du sgom pa brtan por byed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-29: 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i nang du spros pa'o //
T02D1851-2:103b-30: spro bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid
T02D1851-2:103b-31: kyi 'od zer phyung bas nam mkha' khyab par bya
T02D1851-2:103b-32: ba'o // rang gis bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1851-2:103b-33: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'khor lo dang padma la sogs
T02D1851-2:103b-34: ba'o // pa spro ba'o // de ltar zhes bya
T02D1851-2:103b-35: ba ni chags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba dang
T02D1851-2:103b-36: sbyar te bstan pa'i rim gyis 'dod chags kyi rang
T02D1851-2:103b-37: bzhin spros pas sa gsum po ma lus par bskyed
T02D1851-2:103b-38: ba'o // pa spro ba'o // par bya'o // zhe
T02D1851-2:103b-39: sdang gti mug ces bya ba yang de ltar zhes
T02D1851-2:103b-41: rim pa de nyid kyis zhe sdang gi rang bzhin
T02D1851-2:103b-42: dang gti mug gi rang bzhin du 'gro ba rnams
T02D1851-2:103b-43: bskyed pa'o // rgyas btab cing zhes pa ni spros
T02D1851-2:103b-44: pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa las byung ba shin tu
T02D1851-2:103b-45: phra ba'i gdan sngar gyi gdan dang mtshungs pa'i reg
T02D1851-2:103b-46: bskyed pa'o // bya dang / kha dog can nor
T02D1851-2:103b-47: bu phra mo'i nang du rnam par bsam mo zhes
T02D1851-2:104a-0: @104a * // rdo rje can gyi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-1: don zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid rnal 'byor pas byed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-2: don ji lta bu zhig byed ce na //
T02D1851-2:104a-4: sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-5: de dag ni bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D1851-2:104a-6: zhar la 'ongs pa bshad nas gzhan le'u dgu pa
T02D1851-2:104a-7: las 'dod chags la sogs pas sems can gyi don
T02D1851-2:104a-9: zhe sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D1851-2:104a-10: zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su //
T02D1851-2:104a-11: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-12: zhe sdang rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:104a-13: bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1851-2:104a-14: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i ngos la
T02D1851-2:104a-15: bsgoms pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bkod
T02D1851-2:104a-16: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-17: rdo rje drag po zhes bya ba ni bdag gi dkyil 'khor ba'i lag pas 'phangs pas so //
T02D1851-2:104a-18: bcom nas su zhes bya ba ni bkod pa chen po de dag nyid bsad pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-19: ye shes rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni bcom pa rnams kyi ye shes sems dpa' ste //
T02D1851-2:104a-20: bsdus nas bdag gi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes sems dpa' la bsdu ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-21: de zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa de rnams so //
T02D1851-2:104a-22: gsad par bya zhes bya ba ni slar spro ste
T02D1851-2:104a-23: bcom pa rnams la rjes su bcug pas yang dag
T02D1851-2:104a-24: par gso ba'o // de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du gsad pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-25: goms byas na zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du spro zhing bsdus pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-26: zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur ba ni mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-27: khams gsum po ni ma lus pa bsad dang zhes
T02D1851-2:104a-28: bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phral gyi 'bras bu
T02D1851-2:104a-29: ste gsad par nus pa zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D1851-2:104a-30: brtan par gyur pas mngon du nus par gyur pa'o
T02D1851-2:104a-31: // gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1851-2:104a-32: rgyan la sogs pa ni nam mkhar bsams pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-33: brku bar bya zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dang
T02D1851-2:104a-34: bdag gi dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyis kyang blangs te
T02D1851-2:104a-35: spyad pa'o // rtag tu zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-36: gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi dkyil 'khor ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104a-37: gti mug 'khor lo can gyis kun la ste //
T02D1851-2:104a-38: bcom pa rnams la ni rin po che slar sbyin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-0: 'dod chags ni @104b snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1851-2:104b-1: lha mo thams cad ni nam mkhar bltas pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D1851-2:104b-2: 'dod pa'i sbyor ba ni 'dod pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-3: dga' ba ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-4: sdug pa ni dga' ba dang yang dag par mtshon pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-5: bde ba ye shes skye ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-6: rangs pa ni bde ba las byung ba'i rab tu mgu ba'o /
T02D1851-2:104b-7: 'dod pa'i rtsed mo ni rengs pa las byung ba'i lus dang ngag gi 'gyur ba'o //

T02D1851-2:104b-10: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni gnyi ga'i rim pa
T02D1851-2:104b-11: bzhin du gti mug rdo rje dang 'dod chags rdo
T02D1851-2:104b-12: rje'o ; / skad cig tsam gyis zhes bya ba
T02D1851-2:104b-13: ni ji ltar bstan pa'i don de rnams rnal 'byor

T02D1851-2:104b-18: don rnams ni de dag med par mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na //
T02D1851-2:104b-19: 'dir dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te las mchog ni /
T02D1851-2:104b-22: nyams su len pa'i thabs su bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-23: byin gyis rlob pa ni nus pa lhag par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-24: grub pa ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:104b-25: de dag gi bgrod pa gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan yin gyi //
T02D1851-2:104b-26: gdon mi za bar rgyud ji bzhin du ni ma yin te //
T02D1851-2:104b-27: gang gi phyir khyad par du gyur pa 'di dag

T02D1851-2:104b-30: kyi sbas pa'i tshig gi don zhar la 'ongs pa
T02D1851-2:104b-31: dang bcas pa gsal bar byas nas sgrub pa'i le'u
T02D1851-2:104b-32: rnams kyi sbas pa'i tshig don brjod par bya ste
T02D1851-2:104b-33: pa'i phyir ro // // de la dkyil 'khor ni phal cher bzhi ba dang /

T02D1851-2:104b-37: de'i phyir shes rab bha gar brjod ces gsungs pas na /
T02D1851-2:104b-38: bha ga ni shes rab yin la de nyid ni ngag yin te //
T02D1851-2:104b-39: de'i phyir bha ga'i dkyil 'khor ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:104b-40: byang chub kyi sems ni thugs so //
T02D1851-2:104b-41: de'i phyir byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1851-2:104b-42: lus ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1851-2:105a-0: de bas na de'i dkyil 'khor ni sku'i @105a * //
T02D1851-2:105a-2: yang na bha ga ni gdan dang sngags so //
T02D1851-2:105a-4: lus ni phyag rgya chen po'o //

T02D1851-2:105a-6: gsum char yang snying po bsdus pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02D1851-2:105a-7: phyag rgya dgod pa yang dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:105a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi de ma thag tu de dris pas
T02D1851-2:105a-9: na de'i lan phung po zhes bya ba la sogs

T02D1851-2:105a-12: phyag rgya gang gi yin zhe na ;

T02D1851-2:105a-14: 'o na sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya gang la gdab ce na //
T02D1851-2:105a-15: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ste //
T02D1851-2:105a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di //
T02D1851-2:105a-18: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams so //
T02D1851-2:105a-19: lcags kyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste ;
T02D1851-2:105a-20: / snying gar son pa'i khro bo'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:105a-22: rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rnams //
T02D1851-2:105a-23: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
T02D1851-2:105a-24: gzhan dag ni dkyil 'khor chen po nyid kyi'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1851-2:105a-25: sa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba ni lha mo bcu po rnams so //
T02D1851-2:105a-26: rang gi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni ji
T02D1851-2:105a-27: lta ba bzhin du so sor sdud pa las las
T02D1851-2:105a-28: rang rang gi 'dod pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1851-2:105a-29: longs spyod bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las la sogs pa rnams
T02D1851-2:105a-30: kyi'o // me long la sogs pa'i phyag rgya drug
T02D1851-2:105a-31: ni dkyil 'khor chen po nyid kyi 'dod pa rnams
T02D1851-2:105a-32: kyi'o // kyi'o // sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:105a-33: byang chub sems dpa' ni rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams so //
T02D1851-2:105a-34: khro bo'i rgyal po ni sgo skyong rnams te /
T02D1851-2:105a-35: de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du
T02D1851-2:105a-36: bshad pas 'dir ma bstan to zhes bya bar dgongs
T02D1851-2:105a-37: so // gal te de ltan ci'i phyir sa la
T02D1851-2:105a-38: sogs pa'i sems dpa' rnams phyag rgya rang gi dkyil
T02D1851-2:105a-40: de lta yin pa de nyid kyi phyir so sor
T02D1851-2:105a-41: sdud pa'i dkyil 'khor dang longs spyod bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1851-2:105a-42: gyi dbang du byas pa'i gdan bcu'i dkyil 'khor yin
T02D1851-2:105b-0: par @105b shes par bya ba'i phyir sa la sogs
T02D1851-2:105b-1: pa'i sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1851-2:105b-3: de bzhin du lcags kyu la sogs pa yang 'gog
T02D1851-2:105b-4: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa yin pas
T02D1851-2:105b-5: na phyag rgya thams cad gcig kho nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1851-2:105b-6: chen po'i dbang du byas te /
T02D1851-2:105b-7: gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:105b-8: de bas na phyag rgya sum cu rtsa gcig bdag
T02D1851-2:105b-9: po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lha sum
T02D1851-2:105b-10: cu rtsa gnyis kyi yin par kha cig smra ba
T02D1851-2:105b-11: de dag rigs pa ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:105b-12: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1851-2:105b-13: rnams kyis ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa bzhin
T02D1851-2:105b-14: te rigs rnams kyi mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1851-2:105b-15: kyi mtshan ma nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni
T02D1851-2:105b-17: de bas gzhan du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1851-2:105b-18: la gzhan du zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan du
T02D1851-2:105b-20: dpa' bo gcig ces bya ba la dpa' bo ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin pas so ;
T02D1851-2:105b-21: / gcig ni grogs med pas so //
T02D1851-2:105b-22: rigs kyi kha dog gis ni brtag / ces bya
T02D1851-2:105b-23: ba la brtag ces pa ni brtag go zhes bya
T02D1851-2:105b-24: ba da lta'i ba'i dus ston pa'o / de las
T02D1851-2:105b-25: zhes bya ba ni ltos pa'i lnga pa ste /
T02D1851-2:105b-26: rgyud 'di'i skabs su zhal gsum phyag drug pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D1851-2:105b-27: rigs zhes bya ba ni khyim ste de rnams rang gi rgyud do //
T02D1851-2:105b-28: rigs de'i kha dog gcig gis brtags te /
T02D1851-2:105b-29: de la barna ni sngags dang mtshan ma dang dkar
T02D1851-2:105b-30: po la sogs pa dang bram ze dang rgyal rigs
T02D1851-2:105b-31: la sogs pa bzhin du rigs dang rnam pa bzhi
T02D1851-2:105b-32: la bya'o // phyag rgya dgod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:105b-33: padma dang autpala sogs pa me tog dang mchod rten
T02D1851-2:105b-34: dag brgyad pa las gsungs pa de'i don dri ba
T02D1851-2:105b-35: zhus pa'i lan ni lha mo zhes bya ba la
T02D1851-2:105b-36: sogs pa gsungs pa lha mo dgu ni rig ma
T02D1851-2:105b-37: dgu'o // de rnams kyi nam mkha'i khams ni gsang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:105b-38: me tog ces bya ba ni me tog gi ming can no //
T02D1851-2:105b-39: dgod par bya zhes bya ba ni me tog de rnams nyid do //
T02D1851-2:105b-40: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1851-2:105b-41: rim gyis zhes bya ba ni gti mug dang 'dod
T02D1851-2:105b-42: chags dang zhe sdang skyed par byed pa'i sku rnams
T02D1851-2:105b-43: ni go rims bzhin du gti mug dang 'dod chags
T02D1851-2:105b-45: de bzhin du gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1851-2:105b-46: gti mug dang zhe sdang dang 'dod chags gnyis dang
T02D1851-2:106a-1: rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ni gzhal yas khang ste mchod rten no //
T02D1851-2:106a-2: 'dis ni mchod rten yang bshad pa yin te /
T02D1851-2:106a-3: gnyi ga'i don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:106a-4: ye shes 'khor lo dang gnas kyi yi ge dang
T02D1851-2:106a-5: dam tshig bskul ba dang gtong ba dang bod pa
T02D1851-2:106a-6: dang bcing ba ste bcu drug pa las gsung pa
T02D1851-2:106a-8: dri ba'i lan ni ye shes sems //
T02D1851-2:106a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1851-2:106a-10: ye shes sems dpas sprul zhing phyung ba'i 'khor lo gang yin pa de ye shes 'khor lo ste /
T02D1851-2:106a-11: ye shes las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
T02D1851-2:106a-12: / de nyid ni kun du rtog pas zhes bya bar byas pas dam tshig go //
T02D1851-2:106a-13: sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad //
T02D1851-2:106a-15: lha'i gnas yin pas na sa bon no //
T02D1851-2:106a-16: de'i brjod pa ni yi ge ste nges gnas so //
T02D1851-2:106a-17: ji ltar rjod par byed pas yi ge yin zhe na /
T02D1851-2:106a-18: gang gi phyir yi ge tsam 'dir yi ge ma yin te ;
T02D1851-2:106a-20: rdo rje gsum po de yi ge mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1851-2:106a-21: sems gang yin pa de nyid brjod pa'i ngag gi rnam pa dang /
T02D1851-2:106a-23: rdo rje gsum po de las mi 'gyur bas ni rdo rje gsum yi ge'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-24: de'i phyir rjod par byed pas na yi ge yin gyi yi ge tsam ni ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:106a-25: sad par bya ba ni dam tshig ste ye shes kyi 'khor la'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge yin te /
T02D1851-2:106a-27: des na de nyid brjod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:106a-28: 'od zer 'byed pa ni 'od 'bar zhig spro ba'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-29: rdo rje kun ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-30: rdo rje can ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can no //
T02D1851-2:106a-31: de rnams spyan drangs pa ni 'od zer de nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-32: de'i gnas ni ye shes kyi sa bon no //
T02D1851-2:106a-33: dbang bskur ba dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni bcu
T02D1851-2:106a-34: drug pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa'i
T02D1851-2:106a-35: lan ni sku zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:106a-36: la / sku la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1851-2:106a-37: bdag po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1851-2:106a-38: gyi sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste /
T02D1851-2:106a-39: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhing 'byin par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:106a-40: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa las /
T02D1851-2:106a-41: dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
T02D1851-2:106a-42: rab tu brtag par su yis nus //
T02D1851-2:106a-43: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1851-2:106b-2: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas cho ga bzhin du
T02D1851-2:106b-3: bzhugs shing cho ga bzhin du bcug pa'i slob ma
T02D1851-2:106b-4: la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya zhes bya ba
T02D1851-2:106b-6: ci'i phyir 'dir dbang bskur gsum gsungs she na /
T02D1851-2:106b-7: gsum po nyid kyis slob dpon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:106b-8: de ltar bzhi pa de bzhin no //
T02D1851-2:106b-9: zhes bya ba ni gsum po dag las lhag ma nyid kyi phyir bzhi ste /
T02D1851-2:106b-11: de yang de bzhin te zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan ji lta ba de bzhin du ste /
T02D1851-2:106b-12: de bas na de'i rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-13: de yang dbang bskur ba drug ste /
T02D1851-2:106b-19: ming gi dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-20: de la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni le'u bcu
T02D1851-2:106b-21: drug pa nyid du yongs su gsal bar mdzad pa
T02D1851-2:106b-22: yin no // gnyis pa ni mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1851-2:106b-23: sngags ni yid ches pa 'di nyid do //
T02D1851-2:106b-24: sngags kyi snod du rung ba ni /
T02D1851-2:106b-25: thos pa dang dad pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:106b-26: me tog ni dus su 'byung ba'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-27: rdo rje thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02D1851-2:106b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni ro gcig par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1851-2:106b-29: de'i rnam pa phyung nas so //
T02D1851-2:106b-30: gsum pa ni mchog tu dad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1851-2:106b-31: sbyor ba gcig ni rgyud gcig la nan tan du byed pa'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-32: dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can //
T02D1851-2:106b-33: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol rnal 'byor ba sgrub pa pa'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-35: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:106b-36: gti mug gi rigs rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa na'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-37: gti mug bdag nyid rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-38: gti mug dga' ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:106b-39: rig ma de nyid gti mug dga' mar byas pa'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-40: gti mug rgyun ni bsil zhing dkar ba'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-41: gti mug rdo rje rang nyid gyur //
T02D1851-2:106b-42: zhes pas de'i rigs las skyes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos zhes pa'o //

T02D1851-2:106b-44: 'on kyang zhe sdang gi rgyun ni dro zhing gnag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-45: 'dod chags kyi rgyun ni padma r'a ga lta bu'o //
T02D1851-2:106b-46: shes rab ye shes ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-0: rig pa'i brtul zhugs la sgrub pa pos ni rig pa gnyi g-yongs @107a * //
T02D1851-2:107a-1: su gzung ste gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-2: slob dpon tsam bzhi ni phyi rol gyi nges pa ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:107a-3: bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga dag bsten pa
T02D1851-2:107a-4: ni bcu drug pa dang bcu gnyis pa la sogs
T02D1851-2:107a-5: pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa 'di
T02D1851-2:107a-6: dag gi lan ni tha mal zhes bya ba la

T02D1851-2:107a-9: ngo bo nyid des dri ma lnga rnams de nyid do //
T02D1851-2:107a-10: lus kyi chos la zhes bya ba ni lus gnas pa'i phung po la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-11: snang ba ni yongs su gsal bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:107a-12: de bas na ngo bo nyid de nyid bsten par
T02D1851-2:107a-13: mi bya bar dgongs so 'o na ji ltar na
T02D1851-2:107a-14: bdud rtsi lnga yin zhe na /
T02D1851-2:107a-15: ye shes lnga yis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D1851-2:107a-16: ye shes lnga ni spar ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-17: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab pa ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-18: des ni bdud rtsi lnga nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-19: de bas na bdud rtsi lnga zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1851-2:107a-20: 'di rnams kyi 'grel pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D1851-2:107a-21: rdo rje ni sngon po kha gyen du bltas pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-22: padma ni thod pa dmar po kha bkag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-23: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni padma'i nang du'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-24: spar ba dang gdung bar bya ba ni ye shes gnyis so //
T02D1851-2:107a-25: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
T02D1851-2:107a-26: shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing //
T02D1851-2:107a-27: zhes bya ba ni shel dang 'dra bar dang bar byas nas so //
T02D1851-2:107a-28: de ni ye shes gsum pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-29: ye shes nyi ma bzhi bar gyur //
T02D1851-2:107a-30: ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin can
T02D1851-2:107a-31: gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bstan nas so
T02D1851-2:107a-32: // de ni ye shes bzhi pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-33: mtshon cha'i tshogs ni 'od zer rnams so /
T02D1851-2:107a-34: 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud rtsi gang yin pa
T02D1851-2:107a-35: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ka na
T02D1851-2:107a-36: gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-37: phab nas kyang zhes bya ba ni thugs kar zhugs te /
T02D1851-2:107a-38: sbubs kyis 'dren pa bzhin du drangs nas so //
T02D1851-2:107a-39: de ni ye shes lnga pa'o //
T02D1851-2:107a-40: bza' ba'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi lus dang /
T02D1851-2:107a-43: ye shes gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas so //
T02D1851-2:107a-44: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i cho ga nyid kyis so //

T02D1851-2:113a-22: rdo rje ni mchog tu phra ba'i sa bon no //
T02D1851-2:113a-23: padma'i mtshan ma phra mo'i nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gdan no //
T02D1851-2:113a-24: de dag gi mnyam sbyor ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
T02D1851-2:113a-25: cho ga bzhin sgrub pa'i padmar rdo rje bsgoms pa nyid do //
T02D1851-2:113a-26: bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o ;
T02D1851-2:113a-27: / thabs zhu ba las cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang phyug tu bya'o //
T02D1851-2:113a-28: h'um zhes bya ba ni de'i sa bon nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1851-2:113a-29: phat ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi sa bon dgag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:113a-30: ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D1851-2:113a-31: rang gi bde ba ni rig ma rnams so //
T02D1851-2:113a-32: zhi ba ni sgo srung rnams so //
T02D1851-2:113a-33: gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa ni shes rab dang thabs so //
T02D1851-2:113a-34: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis so //
T02D1851-2:113a-35: bskyod ces bya ba ni dal bu dal bus so //
T02D1851-2:113a-36: h'um zhes bya ba ni rdo rje padma dag gi'o //
T02D1851-2:113a-37: ka zhes bya ba ni sku'i sa bon te rab sngags so //
T02D1851-2:113a-38: ra la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi sa bon te aa'o //
T02D1851-2:113a-39: de dag ni nor bu gnyis kyi'o //
T02D1851-2:113a-40: phat ni snga ma bzhin no //

T02D1851-2:113a-43: de nyid las gzhan la mi dmigs pa ni zhi ba ste /
T02D1851-2:113a-45: thabs las byung ba'i dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i
T02D1851-2:113b-0: lan gsungs @113b pa dpal ldan zhes bya ba la
T02D1851-2:113b-1: sogs pa la / dpal ni rig ma rnams so //
T02D1851-2:113b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1851-2:113b-3: rdo rje 'dzin chen ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1851-2:113b-4: gnas ni dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can yin pas so //
T02D1851-2:113b-5: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1851-2:113b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs
T02D1851-2:113b-7: byung ngo // de nyid chos rnams kyi chos nyid
T02D1851-2:113b-8: de bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos dkar po thams
T02D1851-2:113b-9: cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid

T02D1851-2:113b-12: gang gi dbang gis de rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1851-2:113b-13: sku dang sprul pa'i skus bdag dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1851-2:113b-14: phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar thug pa ste thabs las
T02D1851-2:113b-15: byung ba'o // thabs bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa
T02D1851-2:113b-16: gang yin pa de rnams kyi nang nas ci gcig
T02D1851-2:113b-17: gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ram /
T02D1851-2:113b-18: 'on te ma lus pas yin zhes 'di dpyad par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:113b-19: ma lus pas zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //
T02D1851-2:113b-21: gsum pos rim gyis de dang de'i khyad par grub
T02D1851-2:113b-22: pa yod na bzhi par 'bras bu ma lus pa

T02D1851-2:113b-28: sgrub pa chen po la ni shin tu rnam par
T02D1851-2:113b-29: dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du mngon sum du
T02D1851-2:113b-30: gyur pa byang chub yin no //
T02D1851-2:113b-31: gzhan yang bsnyen pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khams rgyas pa dang /
T02D1851-2:113b-32: nye bar sgrub pa la ni skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1851-2:113b-33: sgrub pa la ni dag pa dang sgrub pa chen
T02D1851-2:113b-34: po la shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang
T02D1851-2:113b-35: yang dag par ston pa la dbang du gyur pa

T02D1851-2:113b-37: nye bar sgrub pa thob pa rab tu dga' ba

T02D1851-2:113b-41: sgrub pa chen pos thob par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis nyid yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T02D1851-2:113b-42: gzhan yang dngos grub mchog gi phyir zhing du gyur ba ni bsnyen pa'i don yin la /

T02D1851-2:114a-4: dbang pa la longs spyod pa de sgrub pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:114a-6: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
T02D1851-2:114a-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni //
T02D1851-2:114a-8: chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang //

T02D1851-2:114a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog des thob ;

T02D1851-2:114a-18: bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bco lnga pa las /
T02D1851-2:114a-19: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //

T02D1851-2:114a-24: 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa //

T02D1851-2:114a-27: 'dir sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D1851-2:114a-28: sangs rgyas nyid ni ma yin pa de bas na /

T02D1851-2:114a-30: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyid dang mnyam pa
T02D1851-2:114a-31: yin gyi shin tu rnam par dag pa dag ni
T02D1851-2:114a-32: ma yin pa des na chos rnams kun dang mtshungs
T02D1851-2:114a-34: rgyal po ni rnam par mi rtog pa la dbang
T02D1851-2:114a-35: du gyur pa dang zhing la dbang du gyur pa
T02D1851-2:114a-36: dang ye shes la dbang du gyur pa dang las
T02D1851-2:114a-37: la dbang du gyur bas so //
T02D1851-2:114a-38: slob ma'i sa ni thams cad 'dod pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:114a-39: de'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba ni 'dod pa'i thar ba ste /

T02D1851-2:114a-41: sgrub pa chen po'i 'bras bu ni bcu drug pa las /
T02D1851-2:114a-42: dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni //
T02D1851-2:114a-43: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur //

T02D1851-2:114a-46: 'dir dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni rtse mo ste /
T02D1851-2:114b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya @114b ba'i don to //

T02D1851-2:114b-2: dang chos mthun pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa rnam
T02D1851-2:114b-3: pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku rgyun mi
T02D1851-2:114b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni mchog ste dam pa'i sgrub pa'o //
T02D1851-2:114b-6: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgoms pa ste /
T02D1851-2:114b-7: sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin la /
T02D1851-2:114b-8: de las rdo rje rab tu bsgom pa ni gsang
T02D1851-2:114b-9: ba gsum po dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam rnam par rab
T02D1851-2:114b-10: tu phye nas bsgom pa ste /

T02D1851-2:114b-14: nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi ma lus pas ma yin
T02D1851-2:114b-15: zhing / rim pa gzhan gyis kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa yin no //

T02D1851-2:114b-17: pa chen po nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur na de
T02D1851-2:114b-19: gzhan gsum pos ci zhig bya zhe na /

T02D1851-2:114b-21: pa'i ched kyi sbyor ba gang yin pa de nyid
T02D1851-2:114b-22: chog na mos pas spyod pa la sogs pas sa

T02D1851-2:114b-25: yang na sa snga mar gtogs pa'i sbyor ba med

T02D1851-2:114b-28: ro // byed pa nyid 'jig pa yin pa de nyid ni ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:114b-30: de'i gzugs brnyan tam yin te /
T02D1851-2:114b-31: de'i gzugs brnyan ni de'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:114b-32: de bas na de rnams 'bras bu med pa ma
T02D1851-2:114b-33: yin no snyam na de bzhin du bsnyen pa la
T02D1851-2:114b-34: sogs pa la yang snga ma snga ma med par
T02D1851-2:114b-35: nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa byed pa gang
T02D1851-2:114b-36: yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan tsam yin gyi de
T02D1851-2:114b-37: nyid ni ma yin pa de ltar na de las
T02D1851-2:114b-39: de bas na gcig kyang don med pa ma yin no //
T02D1851-2:114b-40: 'o na ji ltar na sgrub pa chen po las sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1851-2:114b-42: gsum po dag las rim gyis rtog pa'i sal gnas
T02D1851-2:114b-43: pa des mthar thug pa thob par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1851-2:114b-44: // yid kyi chos gang dag goms pas bogs phyin
T02D1851-2:114b-45: bar gyur pa de dag shin tu goms par byas
T02D1851-2:114b-46: na na rab kyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur
T02D1851-2:115a-0: // par srid de / bram ze gtsang mar spyod pa rnams @115a * //
T02D1851-2:115a-1: thod pa can la dga' ba bzhin no //

T02D1851-2:115a-4: ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
T02D1851-2:115a-5: de bas na 'di ni rang rgyud rigs mthun pa

T02D1851-2:115a-7: thug par srid par rjes su dpog pa yin te
T02D1851-2:115a-8: / de dag nyid kyis de rnams sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1851-2:115a-9: chos rnams dang byang chub tu 'gyur bar srid pa
T02D1851-2:115a-11: 'gyur ba de yang nyan thos dang pha rol tu

T02D1851-2:115a-13: kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin

T02D1851-2:115a-15: pa gsum du bsgrub pas so //
T02D1851-2:115a-16: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyis ni sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D1851-2:115a-17: la sogs pa'i thabs dpag tu med pas sngags kyi
T02D1851-2:115a-18: lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs /

T02D1851-2:115a-20: thogs par tshe 'di nyid la rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D1851-2:115a-21: sa thob nas / tshes bcu drug gis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D1851-2:115a-22: gsang ba 'dus pa ni rgyud rnams kyi bla ma'i
T02D1851-2:115a-23: bla ma ste tshe 'di nyid la byang chub thob

T02D1851-2:115a-37: gzhan du bskal pa stong du ni //

T02D1851-2:115a-42: ma lus pa'i rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur

T02D1851-2:119a-3: ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje dag / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyis 'grub 'gyur //
T02D1851-2:119a-5: gang yang gzungs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1851-2:119a-6: la son pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dang po'i
T02D1851-2:119a-7: don gyis gnyis pa'o// chos zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir ye shes kyi tshig go //
T02D1851-2:119a-8: gang zhes bya ba ni chos gang dag yin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-9: kha cig la ni yongs su gzung ba zhes 'byung ste /
T02D1851-2:119a-10: der ni ngag dang de ni rtag tu 'brel pa
T02D1851-2:119a-11: yin pas gang zhes bya ba don gyis shes par
T02D1851-2:119a-12: bya ba'o // ji lta bu'i chos she na /
T02D1851-2:119a-13: sems kyi rang bzhin du son pa ste /
T02D1851-2:119a-14: 'khor lo ser po rtsibs bcu pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:119a-15: ste zhes bya ba ni tshig kha bskang ba'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-16: ji lta bu'i chos yin zhe na /
T02D1851-2:119a-17: gzungs ba dang dga' ba dang rnam pa dang mi
T02D1851-2:119a-18: g-yo ba dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang drug ste
T02D1851-2:119a-19: / gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1851-2:119a-20: rmongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhi ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1851-2:119a-21: gti mug la sogs pa ni mthar byed rnams so //
T02D1851-2:119a-22: de rnams kyang 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la ni mtshan
T02D1851-2:119a-23: ma'i rnam pa yin la srung ba'i 'khor lo la
T02D1851-2:119a-25: khro bo'i 'khor lo la bstod pas bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-26: gang zhig gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam dag ni so sor dag pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-27: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'di dag go //
T02D1851-2:119a-28: 'di la thog ma med pa'i ngo bo yod pas na thog ma med dngos so //
T02D1851-2:119a-29: shes rab thabs dag ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul
T02D1851-2:119a-30: la sogs pa'i rim gyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i skyes
T02D1851-2:119a-31: bu'o // dpe dang bral bas na dpe med pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-32: de lta bu'i lha rnams shin tu bsgom pa ni gsang ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas te /
T02D1851-2:119a-33: de la gsang ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-34: dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi cod pan no //
T02D1851-2:119a-35: brtul zhugs ni rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-36: sdom pa ni bla na med pa'i bde ba ste /
T02D1851-2:119a-37: sgom pa po de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar blta'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-38: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1851-2:119a-39: byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1851-2:119a-40: rnal 'byor pa la bstod pas bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-41: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la nye
T02D1851-2:119a-42: bar sgrub pa dang bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen
T02D1851-2:119a-43: po dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1851-2:119a-44: nye bar sgrub pa dang bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:119a-45: blo mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i blo yod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119a-46: sgrub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni dngos grub mchog gi sgrub pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1851-2:119b-0: gang zhig ces bya ba @119b la sogs pa la
T02D1851-2:119b-1: thun bzhi zhes bya ba ni thun mtshams bzhir byas
T02D1851-2:119b-2: pa'o // rdo rje bzhi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhi po rnams kyis so //
T02D1851-2:119b-3: mi snang ba la sogs zhes bya ba ni mi
T02D1851-2:119b-4: snang ba la sogs pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub
T02D1851-2:119b-5: du ma rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:119b-6: ma nyams pa zhes bya ba ni ma tshang ba med pa'i lam 'di'o//
T02D1851-2:119b-7: rtogs pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-8: dngos grub gnyis kyi sgrub pa po la bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-9: nyan pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan las gzhung dang don 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-10: 'don pa ni rang nyid 'don par byed pas na rang 'don par byed pa ste /
T02D1851-2:119b-11: thos pa rnams de bzhin du yang dag par dpyad
T02D1851-2:119b-12: pas rang nyid goms par byed ces bya ba'i bar
T02D1851-2:119b-13: du'o // 'dir 'don pa'i yul du byas pa ste des byas pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-14: klog pa zhes bya ba ni tshig tu brjod pas so //
T02D1851-2:119b-15: sems dpa' dang zhes bya ba ni the tshom gcad
T02D1851-2:119b-16: par bya ba'i phyir rang ngam gzhan las yang dag
T02D1851-2:119b-18: rigs pa'i yul las 'das pa la yang bcom ldan
T02D1851-2:119b-19: 'das nyid tshad mar byas pas rnam par dpyod pa'o
T02D1851-2:119b-20: // gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bstod pas bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-21: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ro //
T02D1851-2:119b-22: mngon ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par brtson pa ste /
T02D1851-2:119b-23: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba rnams la dgos pa med pa'i sgrub pa po dang /
T02D1851-2:119b-24: de rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa yang ngo //
T02D1851-2:119b-25: sgrub pa po dang bsgrub par bya ba ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D1851-2:119b-26: zhi sogs las rgyas shin tu btab pa yis //
T02D1851-2:119b-28: legs par byas pa ste 'khrul 'khor ni gro ga la bris pas so //
T02D1851-2:119b-29: sngags ni sngags kyi cho ga zhig gis so //
T02D1851-2:119b-30: de bzhin rgyas btab ces bya ba ni bsam gtan las 'byung ba'i rgyas btab pas kyang ngo //
T02D1851-2:119b-31: de lta bu'i sgrub pa po dang bsgrub par bya ba la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-32: sgrub pa po dang bsgrub par bya ba la bstod pas bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-33: mthong ba zhes bya ba ni lta ba'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-34: sgrub pa po gtso bo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1851-2:119b-35: sgrub pa po nyid gtso bo ste khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1851-2:119b-36: sgrub pa po lta ba la bstod pas bstod pa'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-37: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni nyes pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-39: rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba ni bstod pa mdzad pa la'o //
T02D1851-2:119b-40: mgon po de dag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D1851-2:119b-41: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D1851-2:120a-0: grags chen po zhes bya ba ni @120a * //
T02D1851-2:120a-2: de skad gsungs nas zhes bya ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1851-2:120a-3: gsang ba thams cad ston pa ni sbas pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02D1851-2:120a-4: 'di nyid rdo rje ste de rnams kyi ye shes ni don la nges pa'o //
T02D1851-2:120a-5: de byin gyis rlob pa ni bskyed pa'o /
T02D1851-2:120a-6: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog las le'u bco brgyad pa'o /
T02D1851-2:120a-8: // / bdag gi dad pa'i stobs kyis rgyud kyi snying po'i don ni rnam 'byed pa'i //
T02D1851-2:120a-9: snyim pa'i me tog byas pa 'di las bsod nams phung po gang bsags pa //
T02D1851-2:120a-10: des ni rim can 'di ni rim gyis byang chub rtogs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D1851-2:120a-11: lha rnams dad pas me tog snyim pa zhags gtor
T02D1851-2:120a-12: ba la brten gyur cig /'dus pa'i snying po rnam
T02D1851-2:120a-14: legs par smras pa dri med rin po ches //
T02D1851-2:120a-15: mun pa bcom nas gsal byed rgyan yin la //
T02D1851-2:120a-16: rnam par 'grel pa'ang rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1851-2:120a-17: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog
T02D1851-2:120a-18: ces bya ba slob dpon chen po ratna a'a kar
T02D1851-2:120a-21: // / pandi ta chen po sh'anta bha dra dang zhu
T02D1851-2:120a-22: chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas
